the Douay and King James versions
杜威译本和钦定本圣经
He was indebted to the pioneering work of John Dewey.
Tā shòuhuìyú Yuēhàn·dù wēi de kāichuàngxìng gōngzuò。
他受惠于约翰·杜威的开创性工作。
a gin and tonic
杜松子酒加奎宁水
Is there any gin left?
剩没剩杜松子酒？
Most gins boil their botanicals directly in the spirit.
Duōshù dù sōngzǐ jiǔ shì zhíjiē zài jiǔjīng zhōng áo zhì zhíwù chéngfèn de。
多数杜松子酒是直接在酒精中熬制植物成分的。
Gin is called mother\'s ruin because it can ruin a family.
Dùsōngzǐjiǔ shì yì zhǒng lièxìng yǐnliào，yīnwèi tā néng huǐmiè yí gè jiātíng。
杜松子酒是一种烈性饮料，因为它能毁灭一个家庭。
A dry martini has a large proportion of gin.
Gān de Mǎtíní jiǔ zhōng dàbùfèn shì Dùsōngzǐ jiǔ。
干的马提尼酒中大部分是杜松子酒。
A very dry martini is almost straight gin.
Bú dài yìdiǎn tiánwèi de mǎdīngníjiǔ jiǎnzhí jiùshì dùsōngzǐjiǔ。
不带一点甜味的马丁尼酒简直就是杜松子酒。
She developed a liking for gin.
Tā mànmàn xǐhuan shàng le dù sōngzǐ jiǔ。
她慢慢喜欢上了杜松子酒。
He was soiled and seedy and fragrant with gin.
Tā yīshānlánlǚ、 lātā bùkān，dàn què yīn dù sōngzǐjiǔ ér dàiyǒu xiāngqì。
他衣衫褴褛、邋遢不堪，但却因杜松子酒而带有香气。
In the bar, a youngish, sharp-eyed man was staring moodily into a gin and tonic.
Jiǔbā lǐ，yí gè mùguāng xīlì de niánqīng nánzǐ yōuyù de dīngzhe yìpíng dùsōngzǐ zībǔjiǔ。
酒吧里，一个目光犀利的年轻男子忧郁地盯着一瓶杜松子滋补酒。
杜门不出
他潜心创作，杜门谢客。
Tā qiánxīn chuàngzuò，dùmén xièkè。
He is concentrating on writing and refuses to see visitors.
走后门是不正之风，要杜绝。
Zǒu hòumén shì búzhèngzhīfēng，yào dùjué。
The irregular practice of pulling strings and abusing influence must be stopped.
杜门谢客
杜门不出
杜门谢客
In 1948 truman crossed the country several times on his whistle-stop tours.

1948年，杜鲁门横穿美国数次进行他的短暂停留访问。
The smart money said Truman would lose the election.
Zhīqíngzhě shuō Dùlǔmén huì zài xuǎnjǔ zhōng shīlì。
知情者说杜鲁门会在选举中失利。
A very dry martini is almost straight gin.

何以解忧？惟有杜康。

There is nothing but wine to assuage my sorrow.
何以解忧，唯有杜康
Kelly transferred from Cornell University to Duke University.
凯莉从康乃尔大学转学到了杜克大学。
杜绝弊端
dùjué bìduān
stop all corrupt practices
杜绝浪费
dùjué làngfèi
put an end to waste
走后门是不正之风，要杜绝。
Zǒu hòumén shì búzhèngzhīfēng，yào dùjué。
The irregular practice of pulling strings and abusing influence must be stopped.
盗版光碟无法彻底杜绝，整治过后又沉滓再起。
Dàobǎn guāngdié wúfǎ chèdǐ dùjué，zhěngzhì guòhòu yòu chénzǐ zàiqǐ。
The production of pirated video discs can\'t be completely stopped.  Stop one producer, and a new one will take their place.
我们要杜绝向人家吃拿卡要的行为。
Wǒmen yào dùjué xiàng rénjia chīná kǎyào de xíngwéi。
We should put a stop to abuses of power.
加强冬防，杜绝火灾。
Jiāqiáng dōngfáng，dùjué huǒzāi。
In winter, measures should be taken to prevent fires from breaking out.
要杜绝人为损坏公用电话的现象。
Yào dùjué rénwéi sǔnhuài gōngyòng diànhuà de xiàn xiàng。
Stop the damage of public telephones.
我们要杜绝摆阔气的流行病。
Wǒmen yào dùjué bǎi kuòqì de liúxíngbìng。
We should put an end to the prevalent social evil of parading one’s wealth.
我们一定要杜绝考试作弊的歪风邪气。
Wǒmen yídìng yào dùjué kǎoshì zuòbì de wāifēng xiéqì。
We must eradicate the unhealthy tendency of cheating in exams.
官僚主义是一种十分恶劣的作风，必须杜绝。
Guānliáozhǔyì shì yìzhǒng shífēn èliè de zuòfēng，bìxū dùjué。
Bureaucratism is a very bad style of work which must be eliminated.
《戏为六绝句》（杜甫）：“尔曹身与名俱灭，不废江河万古流”。
《Xìwéiliùjuéjù》（Dù Fǔ）：“ěrcáo shēn yǔ míng jùmiè，búfèi jiānghé wàngǔliú”。
In A Playful Quatrain, Du Fu wrote, &quot;Even if your bodies and names should perish, the flowing of the rivers will not stop.
少女思春是很正常的事情，杜丽娘要是不怀春就没有《牡丹亭》这部盖世绝剧。
Shàonǚ sīchūn shì hěnzhèngcháng de shìqing，Dù Lìniáng yàoshì bùhuáichūn jiù méiyǒu《Mǔdāntíng》 zhèbù gàishì juéjù。
It is normal for a girl to yearn for love. There wouldn\'t have been the unrivalled play The Peony Pavilion but for Du Liniang\'s desire for love.
杜绝

杜绝一切不正之风

The purple wild ginger flowers give off a faint fragrance.

so as to put an end to abuses

他讲的是真有其事，不是杜撰的。
Tā jiǎng de shì zhēn yǒu qíshì，bú shì dùzhuàn de。
The story he told is true, not made up.
红艳艳的杜鹃花
hóngyànyàn de dùjuānhuā
bright red azaleas
唐朝有很多大诗人，如李白、杜甫、白居易等。
Tángcháo yǒu hěnduō dàshīrén，rú Lǐbái、Dùfǔ、Báijūyìděng。
The Tang Dynasty produced a host of great poets, such as Li Bai, Du Fu and Bai Juyi.
绚烂的杜鹃花
xuànlàn de dùjuānhuā
splendid azaleas

Zǒu hòumén shì búzhèngzhīfēng，yào dùjué。
The irregular practice of pulling strings and abusing influence must be stopped.
杜甫草堂是成都最著名的古迹之一。
Dù Fǔ cǎotáng shì Chéngdūu zuì zhùmíng de gǔjì zhīyī。
Du Fu\'s thatched cottage is one of the most famous relics in Chengdu.
盗版光碟无法彻底杜绝，整治过后又沉滓再起。

The purple wild ginger flowers give off a faint fragrance.
山上开满了红色的杜鹃花，非常好看。
Shānshàng kāi mǎn le hóngsè de dùjuānhuā，fēicháng hǎokàn。
The red azaleas on the hill are very pleasant to the eye.

In A Playful Quatrain, Du Fu wrote, &quot;Even if your bodies and names should perish, the flowing of the rivers will not stop.
李白、杜甫都是唐代格律诗的大家。
Lǐ Bái、Dù Fǔ dōushì tángdài gélǜshī de dàjiā。
Both Li Bai and Du Fu are great masters of poetry with strict tonal patterns and rhyme schemes.
要杜绝人为损坏公用电话的现象。
Yào dùjué rénwéi sǔnhuài gōngyòng diànhuà de xiàn xiàng。
Stop the damage of public telephones.
行院中的女子多薄情寡义，但也有例外，像杜十娘。

Though many prostitutes are faithless and heartless, Du Shiniang is one exception.
我们要杜绝摆阔气的流行病。

This story is pure fabrication.

阿布杜尔在打中十字架之后紧接着射击，又打中了一次。
Dudek was surprised at the request; it was not a course designed to deal with such matters.
Dùdékè duìyú zhège qǐngqiú fēicháng chàyì，zhège qǐngqiú búshì chǔlǐ zhè zhǒng wèntí de fāngfǎ。
杜德克对于这个请求非常诧异，这个请求不是处理这种问题的方法。
A lot of what he claimed, was in fact, fiction.
Tā suǒ xuānchēng de xǔduō nèiróng shíjìshàng dōushì dùzhuàn de。
他所宣称的许多内容实际上都是杜撰的。
Mr Walsh planted a juniper tree in memory of his wife.
Wò\'ěrshí xiānsheng zhòngzhí Dùsōngshū， yǐ jìniàn tā de qīzǐ。
沃尔什先生种植杜松树，以纪念他的妻子。
Gin is called mother\'s ruin because it can ruin a family.

杜松子酒是一种烈性饮料，因为它能毁灭一个家庭。
We were glad to stretch our legs and walk up to Dubtek.
Wǒmen hěn lèyì qǐlái sànsànbù，zǒudào Dùtàikè nàlǐ qù。
我们很乐意起来散散步，走到杜泰克那里去。

心胸开阔
xīnxiōnɡ kāikuò
broad-minded; unprejudiced
他心胸开阔。
Tā xīnxiōngkāikuò.
He\'s broad-minded.
我驰目远眺，感到心胸无比开阔。
Wǒ chímù yuǎntiào，gǎndào xīnxiōng wúbǐ kāikuò。
I look far into the distance, feeling broad-minded.
思想通达，心胸开阔。
版图辽阔
bǎntú liáokuò 
vast in territory
驰骋在辽阔的原野上
chíchěng zài liáokuò de yuányě shàng
gallop across the vast plain
地域辽阔
dìyù liáokuò 
vast in territory
幅员辽阔的国家
fúyuán liáokuò de guójiā
a country with a vast territory
辽阔的土地
liáokuò de tǔdì 
a vast expanse of land; vast territory
我国幅员辽阔。
Wǒ guó fúyuán liáokuò。
Our country has a vast territory.
我国土地辽阔，资源丰富。
Wǒ guó tǔdì liáokuò，zīyuán fēngfù。
Our country has a vast territory and abundant resources.
辽阔
liáokuò
vast; extensive
辽阔的草原上，成群的牛羊在四下奔逐。
Liáokuò de cǎoyuán shàng，chéngqún de niúyáng zài sìxià bēnzhú。
On the wide plain, herds of cattle are frolicking about in the fields.
他策马飞奔在这片辽阔的草原上。
Tā cèmǎfēi bēnzài zhèpiàn liáokuò de cǎoyuán shàng。
He is riding a horse on this vast plain.
站在辽阔的大草原上，她忍不住想要放声高歌。
Zhàn zài liáokuò de dà cǎoyuán shàng，tā rěn bùzhù xiǎng yào fàngshēng gāogē。
She could not help from singing out loud in the open prairie.
草原风谣最能体现草原的辽阔，他非常喜欢。
Cǎoyuán fēngyáo zuì néng tǐxiàn cǎoyuán de liáokuò，tā fēicháng xǐhuan。
He likes grassland folk songs which can best demonstrate the vastness of the land.
这里地势高旷，视野辽阔。
Zhèlǐ dìshì gāokuàng，shìyě liáokuò。
The terrain is tall and wide here, you can have a vast field of vision.
这段狂想曲能令人联想到那辽阔的草原！
Zhè duàn kuángxiǎngqǔ néng lìngrén liánxiǎngdào nà liáokuò de cǎoyuán！
The rhapsody reminds people of a vast plain.
驰骋辽阔草原
chíchěng liáokuòcǎoyuán
gallop across the wide plains
中国幅员辽阔。
Zhōngguó fúyuánliáokuò。
China is vast in size.
辽阔的土地
liáokuò de tǔdì 
vast territory
辽阔。
辽阔的草原，没有边限。
江天辽阔，万里无云。
仰浮在水面，观望辽阔的江天。
辽阔的草原望不到边际
地域辽阔
幅员辽阔
疆域辽阔。
辽阔的内蒙古大草原
湖面非常辽阔。
我国土地辽阔，人口众多。
舆图辽阔。
broad prairies
辽阔的大草原
It is hard to map all the regions of big countries.
为幅员辽阔的国家绘制地图，想把每个地区都详细标注是件困难的事。
An extensive water surfae is not two-dimensional.
地球的辽阔水面都不是平面。
阔叶树种
kuòyè shùzhǒng
broad-leaved trees
这片阔叶林面积很大，树木长势很好。
Zhè piàn kuòyèlín miànjī hěndà，shùmù zhǎngshì hěnhǎo。
The broad-leaved forest is vast, with well-grown trees.
阔叶树
Spinach is a leafy vegetable.
菠菜是阔叶蔬菜。
The zonal vegetation in this area is evergreen broad leaved forest.
这个区域的地域性植被是常绿阔叶林。
一首波澜壮阔、气势磅礴的史诗
yì shǒu bōlánzhuàngkuò、qìshìpángbó de shǐshī
a mighty and magnificent epic; an epic of magnificent sweep
花钱阔气
huā qián kuòqi
spend lavishly
摆阔气
bǎi kuòqi
display (or parade) one\'s wealth
我们要杜绝摆阔气的流行病。
Wǒmen yào dùjué bǎi kuòqì de liúxíngbìng。
We should put an end to the prevalent social evil of parading one’s wealth.
他爱摆阔气。
Tā ài bǎi kuòqì.
He likes to throw his money about.
阔气。
摆阔气、讲排场成了某些地区的流行病。
婚事办得阔气。
摆阔气。
屋里陈设并不阔气，只有随常的几件家具。
他没有阔少爷那种霸气。
They put on the ritz.
Tāmen bǎi kuòqi jiǎng páichǎng。
他们摆阔气讲排场。
He was pacing out the open course.
Tā zài yǐ bùzi liángchū kāikuòdì de chángdù。
他在以步子量出开阔地的长度。
阔步前进
kuòbù qiánjìn
advance with giant strides
他昂首阔步地前进。
Tā ángshǒukuòbùde qiánjìn。
He strode forward with his head held high.
昂首阔步
昂首阔步

昂首阔步
新战士排成方阵，昂首阔步从检阅台前走过。
阔步向前
昂首阔步。
People in swimsuits or shorts and tops strolled on the wide sands.
Rénmen chuānzhe yǒngyī，duǎnkù hé shàngyī zài guǎngkuò de shātān shàng mànbù。
人们穿着泳衣，短裤和上衣在广阔的沙滩上漫步。
He was pacing out the open course.
Tā zài yǐ bùzi liángchū kāikuòdì de chángdù。
他在以步子量出开阔地的长度。
阔别多年的战友
kuòbié duōnián de zhànyǒu
long-separated comrades-in-arms
我们已阔别多年了。
Wǒmen yǐ kuòbié duōnián le。
We\'ve been apart for many years now.
阔别多年，我终于又回到了祖国的热土上！
Kuòbié duōnián，wǒ zhōng yú yòu huídào le zǔguó de rètǔ shàng！
Having been away from my motherland for several years, I have finally returned to my native land!
他阔别故乡已多年。
Tā kuòbié gùxiāng yǐ duōnián.
He hasn\'t seen his home town for a long time.
阔别多年的朋友
kuòbiéduōnián de péngyou
long-lost friend
这条公路是双向十车道的，显得特别阔达。
Zhè tiáo gōnglù shì shuāng xiàng shí chēdào de，xiǎnde tèbié kuòdá。
With ten two-way lanes, the highway looks broad and clear.
这片旷阔的地是准备用来盖别墅的。
Zhè piàn kuàngkuò de dì shì zhǔnbèi yònglái gài biéshù de。
This open place will be used to build a villa.
阔别。
急于重返阔别多年的祖国。
阔别已久。
阔别多年之后，今日重返乡里。
工厂连年亏损，别摆阔撑门面了
巴结阔人
bājie kuòrén 
fawn on rich people
版图辽阔
bǎntú liáokuò 
vast in territory
一首波澜壮阔、气势磅礴的史诗
yì shǒu bōlánzhuàngkuò、qìshìpángbó de shǐshī
a mighty and magnificent epic; an epic of magnificent sweep
驰骋在辽阔的原野上
chíchěng zài liáokuò de yuányě shàng
gallop across the vast plain
大刀阔斧地进行改革
dàdāokuòfǔ de jìnxíng gǎigé

地域辽阔
dìyù liáokuò 
vast in territory
幅员辽阔的国家
fúyuán liáokuò de guójiā
a country with a vast territory
广阔的前景
guǎngkuò de qiánjǐng
broad prospects
交游广阔
jiāoyóu guǎngkuò
have a wide circle of acquaintances; have a large circle of friends
中国国土广阔，资源丰富。
Zhōngguó guótǔ guǎngkuò，zīyuán fēngfù。
China is a vast country abundant in natural resources.
海阔天空地聊个没完
hǎikuòtiānkōng de liáo gè méiwán
have a rambling chat about everything under the sun
海阔天空地谈一通，不解决任何实际问题。
Hǎikuòtiānkōng de tán yì tòng，bùjiějué rènhé shíjì wèntí。
indulge in far-ranging rambling discourse without solving any practical problems
画幅虽然不大，所表现的天地却十分广阔。
Huàfú suīrán bú dà，suǒ biǎoxiàn de tiāndì què shífēn guǎngkuò。
The picture is small but it shows broad vistas.
开阔的广场
kāikuò de guǎngchǎng
an open square
开阔的原野
kāikuò de yuányě

开阔的天空
kāikuò de tiānkōng
the wide open sky
开阔的前额
kāikuò de qián\'é
a broad forehead
他是一个思想开阔而又活泼愉快的人。
Tā shì yígè sīxiǎngkāikuò ér yòu huópō yúkuài de rén。
He\'s a broad-minded, energetic and cheerful person.
开阔路面
kāikuò lùmiàn
widen a road
水天空阔
shuǐtiān kōngkuò
a vast expanse of water and sky
宽阔的林阴道
kuānkuò de línyīndào
a broad (or wide) avenue
宽阔的大厅
kuānkuò de dàtīng
a spacious hall
宽阔的胸怀
kuānkuò de xiōnghuái

他阔起来了。
Tā kuò qǐlái le。
He\'s getting rich.

阔绰的生活
kuòchuò de shēnghuó
an extravagant life
他的日子过得很阔绰。
Tā de rìzi guò de hěn kuòchuò。
He leads an extravagant life.
花钱阔气

辽阔的土地
liáokuò de tǔdì 
a vast expanse of land; vast territory
我国幅员辽阔。
Wǒ guó fúyuán liáokuò。
Our country has a vast territory.
他的发现为利用当地资源开辟了广阔的前景。
Tā de fāxiàn wèi lìyòngdāngdì zīyuán kāipì le guǎngkuò de qiánjǐng。
His discovery opened up a vast range of prospects for making use of local resources.
队伍到达开阔地便成扇形摆开阵势。
Duìwu dàodá kāikuòdì biàn chéngshànxíngbǎikāi zhènshì。
The troops fanned out as they reached open ground.
广阔的视野
guǎngkuò de shìyě
a wide field of vision
你手面太阔了，要节约一点才好。
Nǐ shǒumiàn tài kuò le，yào jiéyuē yì diǎn cái hǎo。
You spend too freely. You should be more thrifty.
阔叶树种
kuòyè shùzhǒng
broad-leaved trees
广阔的田野
guǎngkuò de tiányě 
a vast field; a vast expanse of farmland
我国土地辽阔，资源丰富。
Wǒ guó tǔdì liáokuò，zīyuán fēngfù。
Our country has a vast territory and abundant resources.
心胸开阔
xīnxiōnɡ kāikuò
broad-minded; unprejudiced
胸襟开阔
xiōnɡjīn kāikuò
broad-minded; large-minded
迂阔之论
yūkuòzhīlùn 
impractical views
他阔着呢。
Tā kuò zhe ne。
He is awfully rich.
指手画脚地高谈阔论
zhǐshǒuhuàjiǎo de gāotánkuòlùn 
talk volubly with animated gestures
规模壮阔
guīmó zhuàngkuò 
grand in scale
青年们可以在广阔的科学领域里纵横驰骋。
Qīngniánmen kěyǐ zài guǎngkuò de kēxué lǐngyù lǐ zònghéngchíchěng。
The length and breadth of the whole realm of science is open for our youth to explore and conquer.
辽阔
liáokuò
vast; extensive
阔少
kuòshào
a rich man\'s son
辽阔的草原上，成群的牛羊在四下奔逐。
Liáokuò de cǎoyuán shàng，chéngqún de niúyáng zài sìxià bēnzhú。
On the wide plain, herds of cattle are frolicking about in the fields.
他策马飞奔在这片辽阔的草原上。
Tā cèmǎfēi bēnzài zhèpiàn liáokuò de cǎoyuán shàng。
He is riding a horse on this vast plain.
他这个人胸怀敞阔。
Tā zhège rén xiōnghuái chǎngkuò。
He has a great breadth of mind.
我驰目远眺，感到心胸无比开阔。
Wǒ chímù yuǎntiào，gǎndào xīnxiōng wúbǐ kāikuò。
I look far into the distance, feeling broad-minded.
初见大草原，心情一下子开阔了许多。
Chūjiàn dàcǎoyuán，xīnqíng yíxiàzi kāikuò le xǔduō。
My mind was immediately widened, as soon as I saw the prairie.
重新翻造过的路面，宽阔平整。
Chóngxīn fānzào guò de lùmiàn，kuānkuò píngzhěng。
The renovated road surface is wide and flat.
站在辽阔的大草原上，她忍不住想要放声高歌。
Zhàn zài liáokuò de dà cǎoyuán shàng，tā rěn bùzhù xiǎng yào fàngshēng gāogē。
She could not help from singing out loud in the open prairie.
草原风谣最能体现草原的辽阔，他非常喜欢。
Cǎoyuán fēngyáo zuì néng tǐxiàn cǎoyuán de liáokuò，tā fēicháng xǐhuan。
He likes grassland folk songs which can best demonstrate the vastness of the land.
这里地势高旷，视野辽阔。
Zhèlǐ dìshì gāokuàng，shìyě liáokuò。
The terrain is tall and wide here, you can have a vast field of vision.
黄龙翻腾，广阔的中原大地在它的哺育下生机勃勃。
Huánglóng fānténg，guǎngkuò de zhōng yuán dàdì zài tā de bǔyù xià shēngjī bóbó。
Under the nurture of the writhing Yellow River, the expansive middle land is thriving.
池塘的旁边是一片开阔地，长满了各种小野花。
Chítáng de pángbiān shì yípiàn kāikuòdì，zhǎngmǎn le gèzhǒng xiǎoyěhuā。
Beside the pond is a piece of open land with various kinds of small wild flowers growing on it.
望着那广阔的海面，心情自然宽舒许多！
Wàng zhe nà guǎngkuò de hǎimiàn，xīnqíng zìrán kuānshū xǔduō！
The broad and limitless sea will surely set your mind at ease.
这片旷阔的地是准备用来盖别墅的。
Zhè piàn kuàngkuò de dì shì zhǔnbèi yònglái gài biéshù de。
This open place will be used to build a villa.
他心胸阔达，从来不计较个人得失。
Tā xīnxiōng kuòdá，cónglái bú jìjiào gèrén déshī。
He is open-minded and never cares about individual gains and losses.
这条公路是双向十车道的，显得特别阔达。
Zhè tiáo gōnglù shì shuāng xiàng shí chēdào de，xiǎnde tèbié kuòdá。
With ten two-way lanes, the highway looks broad and clear.
他穿金带银的，一看就是个阔佬。
Tā chuānjīn dàiyín de，yíkàn jiùshì gè kuòlǎo。
Wearing expesive clothes and jewelry, he appears a wealthy man at first sight.
他的家境很好，可以说他是天生的阔人。
Tā de jiājìng hěnhǎo，kěyǐ shuō tā shì tiānshēng de kuòrén。
He was born into a wealthy family.
这片阔叶林面积很大，树木长势很好。
Zhè piàn kuòyèlín miànjī hěndà，shùmù zhǎngshì hěnhǎo。
The broad-leaved forest is vast, with well-grown trees.
大海无垠，晴空朗阔，这景致真美啊。
Dàhǎi wúyín，qíngkōng lǎngkuò，zhè jǐngzhì zhēn měi a。
The boundless sea and vast blue sky constitute beautiful scenery.
我们要杜绝摆阔气的流行病。
Wǒmen yào dùjué bǎi kuòqì de liúxíngbìng。
We should put an end to the prevalent social evil of parading one’s wealth.
漫游生物都有很广阔的生活范围。
Mànyóu shēngwù dōu yǒu hěnguǎngkuò de shēnghuó fànwéi。
Nomadic marine animals have a broad living area.
阔别多年，我终于又回到了祖国的热土上！
Kuòbié duōnián，wǒ zhōng yú yòu huídào le zǔguó de rètǔ shàng！
Having been away from my motherland for several years, I have finally returned to my native land!
外商都很看重我国商品市场的广阔潜力。
Wàishāng dōu hěn kànzhòng wǒguó shāngpǐn shìchǎng de guǎngkuò qiánlì。
Foreign merchants all value the vast potential of our commodity market.
这匹骏马在广阔的草原上奔跑腾跃。
Zhè pǐ jùnmǎ zài guǎngkuò de cǎoyuán shàng bēnpǎo téngyuè。
The steed ran and pranced on the prairie.
这段狂想曲能令人联想到那辽阔的草原！
Zhè duàn kuángxiǎngqǔ néng lìngrén liánxiǎngdào nà liáokuò de cǎoyuán！
The rhapsody reminds people of a vast plain.
他昂首阔步地前进。
Tā ángshǒukuòbùde qiánjìn。
He strode forward with his head held high.

Spinach is a leafy vegetable.
菠菜是阔叶蔬菜。
Travel broadens one\'s horizons.
旅游开阔眼界。
Freeways are wide roads built above city streets.
城市快速路就是建筑在城市街道上面的宽阔马路。
It is hard to map all the regions of big countries.
为幅员辽阔的国家绘制地图，想把每个地区都详细标注是件困难的事。
This is an open space, looks big.
这是一片开阔的空间，看起来挺大的。
In this part of the country, roads are very broad.
该国这个地区，道路十分宽阔。
Beijing is totally different from my home town; broad roads, 24 hour restaurants and millions of people!
北京跟我的家乡完全不同：宽阔的马路，二十四小时餐馆，还有上千万的人口！
At the bottom of the hill the road branches into two broad avenues.
这条马路在山脚处分成了两条宽阔的大街。
I thought that living by yourself would have broadened your views but was wrong.
本以为让你独自生活可以开阔你的眼界，但我错了。
With its wide streets and colorfully painted houses, the city combines Spanish and Caribbean traditions.
这座城市融合了西班牙和加勒比海的建筑传统，有着宽阔的街道和色彩缤纷的房子。
The road stretched across open country.
道路穿过开阔地带向前延伸。
a house set in parkland
座落在开阔草坪上的房屋
the smart set
时髦的阔人
An extensive water surfae is not two-dimensional.
地球的辽阔水面都不是平面。
The zonal vegetation in this area is evergreen broad leaved forest.
这个区域的地域性植被是常绿阔叶林。
The purpose of education should be to expand people\'s minds.
教育的作用应是开阔人的心智。
Later the river traverses a hilly area and becomes wide and tranquil.
Jiēxiàlái，hé liúchuán guò shānqū hòu，biàn de kuānkuò éryòu níngjìng。
接下来，河流传过山区后，变得宽阔而又宁静。
Our country\'s dominion is very vast.
Wǒguó de lǐngtǔ fēicháng guǎngkuò。
我国的领土非常广阔。
The ceremony was performed in the open field near a barn.
Qìngdiǎnhuódòng zài liángcāng fùjìn de kāikuòdì jǔxíng。
庆典活动在粮仓附近的开阔地举行。
We gave it a wide clearance as we walked past.
Dāng wǒmen zǒuguò shí，wǒmen liúchūle yí gè kuānkuò de jùlí。
当我们走过时，我们留出了一个宽阔的距离。
The universe is endless.
Yǔzhòu guǎngkuòwúyín。
宇宙广阔无垠。
The field seemed to go on for miles and miles.
Jìngjìchǎng kànshàngqù hěn kuānkuò。
竞技场看上去很宽阔。
People in swimsuits or shorts and tops strolled on the wide sands.
Rénmen chuānzhe yǒngyī，duǎnkù hé shàngyī zài guǎngkuò de shātān shàng mànbù。
人们穿着泳衣，短裤和上衣在广阔的沙滩上漫步。
Behind that ugly mug, with its forehead like a football pitch, lies a brain of great capacity.
Zài nàge qián\'é xiàng zúqiúchǎng yíyàng kuānkuò de chǒulòu miànkǒng bèihòu，shì yí gè jiēshòu nénglì hěn qiáng de dànǎo。
在那个前额像足球场一样宽阔的丑陋面孔背后，是一个接受能力很强的大脑。
We traveled over the flats of the remainder of the road trip.
Wǒmen zǒuguòle lùtú zhōng shèngyú bùfēn de kāikuòdì。
我们走过了路途中剩余部分的开阔地。
My pony is now 18 but he loves to gallop over the downs!
Wǒ de xiǎomǎ yǐjīng shíbā suì le，tā xǐhuan zài kāikuò de gāodì shàng fēibēn。
我的小马已经十八岁了，他喜欢在开阔的高地上飞奔。
Did it open out a larger world for you?
Tā yǒuméiyǒu wèi nǐ chéngxiàn chū yí gè gèng guǎngkuò de shìjiè？
它有没有为你呈现出一个更广阔的世界？
He was pacing out the open course.
Tā zài yǐ bùzi liángchū kāikuòdì de chángdù。
他在以步子量出开阔地的长度。
Natural resources were scattered over vast areas.
Zìrán zīyuán sànluò zài guǎngkuò de tǔdì shàng。
自然资源散落在广阔的土地上。
He steals into the central open area.
Tā qiāoqiāo jìnrù zhōngxīn kāikuò qūyù。
他悄悄进入中心开阔区域。
They stopped at an open space in the jungle.
Tāmen zài cónglín zhōng de yí piàn kāikuòdì tíng xiàlái。
他们在丛林中的一片开阔地停下来。
There were open fields clear to the horizon.
Zhèli yǒu yìzhí yánshēn dào dìpíngxiàn de guǎngkuò wúyín de tiándì。
这里有一直延伸到地平线的广阔无垠的田地。
He engages in so much tall talk，one never really realizes what he is saying.
Tā mángyú fābiǎo xǔduō gāotánkuòlùn，méiyǒu yí gè rén liǎojiě tā shuō de shì shénme。
他忙于发表许多高谈阔论，没有一个人了解他说的是什么。
Our unfenced and largely unpoliced border inevitably has been very porous.
Wǒmen bú shèfáng de guǎngkuò ér wèi shòu jiānguǎn de biānjiè bùkěbìmiǎn de huì yǒu xǔduō“lòudòng”。
我们不设防的广阔而未受监管的边界不可避免地会有许多“漏洞”。
On the rough sea ice you may on an unshadowed day...fall over a chunk of ice that is kneehigh.
Zài kuānkuò de Bīnghǎi shàng，nǐ yěxǔ néng kànjiàn háowú yīnyǐng de báizhòu …… luòzài qí xī gāo de shuòdà bīngkuài shàng。
在宽阔的冰海上，你也许能看见毫无阴影的白昼……落在齐膝高的硕大冰块上。
Broad fields lay stretched on both sides of us.
Guǎngkuò de yuányě zài wǒmen liǎngpáng shēnzhǎn kāilái。
广阔的原野在我们两旁伸展开来。
They put on the ritz.
Tāmen bǎi kuòqi jiǎng páichǎng。
他们摆阔气讲排场。
These ministers speechify on every occasion.
Zhèxiē bùzhǎngmen zài měi yí gè chǎnghé dōu gāotánkuòlùn。
这些部长们在每一个场合都高谈阔论。
They lived meanly and without ostentation.
Tāmen shēnghuó hěn jiéjiǎn，yìdiǎn yě bù bǎikuò。
他们生活很节俭，一点也不摆阔。
She talked and he dozed and my mind went on autopilot.
Tā zài gāotánkuòlùn，tā zài hūnhūn-chénchén de dǎdǔn，ér wǒ de sīxù què zài zìyóu fēixiáng。
她在高谈阔论，他在昏昏沉沉地打盹，而我的思绪却在自由飞翔。

have a rambling chat about everything under the sun

摆阔气
bǎi kuòqi
display (or parade) one\'s wealth
我们要杜绝摆阔气的流行病。
Wǒmen yào dùjué bǎi kuòqì de liúxíngbìng。
We should put an end to the prevalent social evil of parading one’s wealth.
他爱摆阔气。
Tā ài bǎi kuòqì.
He likes to throw his money about.

摆阔
工厂连年亏损，别摆阔撑门面了
摆阔气、讲排场成了某些地区的流行病。
摆阔比富
摆阔气。

He gave the crank a spin.
Tā zhuàndòngle yí xià qūbǐng。
他转动了一下曲柄。
The crank in a steam engine is used to produce rotary motion.
Zhēngqìjī lǐ de qūbǐng shì yònglái chǎnshēng huízhuǎn yùndòng de。
蒸汽机里的曲柄是用来产生回转运动的。
柄政
Politicians must be careful not to give ammunition to their opponents.
Zhèngzhìjiā bìxū fèichú jǐnshèn，búyào gěi qí duìshǒu liúxià rènhé bǎbǐng。
政治家必须废除谨慎，不要给其对手留下任何把柄。
叶柄。
他这句话已成为笑柄。
Tā zhèjùhuà yǐ chéngwéi xiàobǐng。
That remark of his has become a standing joke.
笑柄
xiàobǐng
laughing stock

to make a mockery of sth
使某事成为笑柄

Yīshēng de bǐjì duō nián lái yìzhí shì rénmen de xiàobǐng。
医生的笔迹多年来一直是人们的笑柄。

政治家必须废除谨慎，不要给其对手留下任何把柄。

qūbǐng yáogǎn jīgòu
crank and rocker mechanism
to wind a crank
摇动曲柄
The crank in a steam engine is used to produce rotary motion.
Zhēngqìjī lǐ de qūbǐng shì yònglái chǎnshēng huízhuǎn yùndòng de。
蒸汽机里的曲柄是用来产生回转运动的。
Every bike has a serial number near the crank shaft.
Měiliàng zìxíngchē zài qūbǐngzhóu fùjìn dōu yǒu yí gè xùlièhào。
每辆自行车在曲柄轴附近都有一个序列号。
He gave the crank a spin.
Tā zhuàndòngle yí xià qūbǐng。
他转动了一下曲柄。
The handle is inclined towards the driver.
Shǒubǐng cháo sījī fāngxiàng wānqū。
手柄朝司机方向弯曲。

jiànbǐnɡ 
the handle of a sword; hilt

In the museum, we saw the famous Moxie double-edged sword.

gěi rén zhuāzhù bǎbǐng 
give sb. a handle (against oneself)
他抓住了你什么把柄？
Tā zhuāzhù le nǐ shénme bǎbǐng? 
What hold does he have on you?

huàbǐng
subject for ridicule; handle
这把刀的刀柄是我自己做的。
Zhèbǎ dāo de dāobǐng shì wǒ zìjǐ zuò de。
I made the knife handle by myself.
玫瑰花的花柄上有刺，拿的时候要小心。

他抓住了我的把柄。
Tā zhuāzhùle wǒde bǎbǐng。
He\'s got a hold over me.
笑柄
xiàobǐng
laughing stock

Biéràng rènhérén zhuāzhù nǐde bǎbǐng。
Don\'t let anyone get a handle on you.

细胞核
xìbāohé
cell nucleus

细胞的中心是细胞核，细胞核由细胞膜包裹。
A sperm is mostly a nucleus surrounded by little other cellular material.
Jīngzǐ de zhǔyào shì yígè xìbāohé hé wéirào gāi xìbāohé de shǎoliàng qítā xìbāo wùzhì gòuchéng。

xìbāo fēnliè
cell division

细胞分裂。

Anthrax grows by dividing into two daughter cells that are generally identical.

Identical twins look just like each other.
同卵双胞胎彼此间非常相像。

每个人，包括同卵双胞胎，其指纹都是独一无二的。

一个细胞可以分裂为两个携带相同基因的细胞。

At the cell\'s centre is the nucleus with an enveloping nuclear membrane.
Xìbāo de zhōngxīn shì xìbāohé，xìbāohé yóu xìbāomó bāoguǒ。
细胞的中心是细胞核，细胞核由细胞膜包裹。
A sperm is mostly a nucleus surrounded by little other cellular material.

顶端原始细胞是跟或茎尖分生组织中的原始细胞。
The cell wall is peculiar for a plant cell.
细胞壁是植物细胞特有的。
One cell can split into two genetically identical cells.
一个细胞可以分裂为两个携带相同基因的细胞。
We have two sorts of light receptors in the retina, rods and cones.
Wǒmen de shìwǎngmó lǐ yǒu liǎng zhǒng shòuguāngtǐ，shìgǎn xìbāo hé shìzhuī xìbāo。

Zhè xiàng yánjiū qīngchu de xiǎnshìle xiāngsì tóng luǎn shuāngbāotāi hé fēi xiāngsì tóng luǎn shuāngbāotāi zhī jiān de yíchuánxué qūbié。
这项研究清楚地显示了相似同卵双胞胎和非相似同卵双胞胎之间的遗传学区别。
The red blood cell of chickens has a nucleus.
Jī de hóngsè xuèxìbāo yǒu yí gè xìbāohé。

休博尔和维瑟尔发现了一种细胞，这种细胞会根据刺激物围绕视网膜移动的方向而做出不同的反应。
Anthrax grows by dividing into two daughter cells that are generally identical.
Tànjū bìngdú yǐ yí gè xìbāo fēnliè chéng liǎng gè dàzhì xiāngtóng de zǐxìbāo de fāngshì lái fánzhí。

Jīngxìbāo cóng jīngmǔxìbāo fāyù ér chéng。

Fàngshèxìng áixìbāo kěyǐ tōngguò fàngshè liáofǎ lái zhìliáo。
放射性癌细胞可以通过放射疗法来治疗。
淋巴细胞是一种体积较小的白细胞。
Línbāxìbāo shì yìzhǒng tǐjī jiàoxiǎo de báixìbāo。
Lymphocyte is a kind of leucocyte of small volume.
The blood test showed a raised white blood cell count.

血检显示白细胞数增加了。
Hyaline casts were admixed with neutrophils.
Tòumíngguǎnxíng yǔ zhōngxìng báixìbāo hùnhé dào yìqǐ。

Dànbáizhì héchéng de kòngzhì shì xìbāo fēnhuà hé fāyù de zhōngxīn rènwù。
蛋白质合成的控制是细胞分化和发育的中心任务。
约略的估计
yuēlüè de gūjì
a rough (or approximate) estimate
现在房产市场波动很大，房价很难准确预估。
Xiànzài fángchǎn shìchǎng bōdòng hěn dà，fángjià hěnnán zhǔnquè yùgū。
Nowadays, with the huge fluctuation in the real estate market, it is hard to predict housing prices.
业绩预估∣成交价高于预估价许多。

zīchǎn pínggū
property assessment

bùkě gūliáng de sǔnshī 
an immeasurable loss

估量
gūliáng
appraise; estimate; assess; reckon

Měinián de shuǐhàn zāihài dōuhuì gěi nóngmín dàilái bùkě gūliàng de sǔnshī。

这场火灾的损失难以估量。
Zhèchǎng huǒzāide sǔnshī nányǐgūliàng。
It\'ll be hard to measure the damage caused by the fire.

It shows that the quantity of water used is zero. His flowmeter must be out of order.
估算产量
gūsuàn chǎnliàng
estimate the yield
估测的数字不准，你们最好亲自去测量一下。

The estimated number is not very accurate, you\'d better measure it yourselves.
估量
估量(ｌｉɑｎɡ)
我估量他来不了
先粗估一下产量。
运用遥感技术估算作物产量。
思想政治工作的力量不可低估。
对教育质量进行评估。
to measure one\'s foe
估量对手
to view a situation with fear

你对她精神上的伤害是难以估量的。

He who succeeds, will have power beyond measure.
Gōngchéng-míngjiù de tā jiāng yōngyǒu wú kě-gūliàng de quánlì。
功成名就的他将拥有无可估量的权利。
Human behavior depends on many imponderables.
Rénlèi xíngwéi qǔjuéyú xǔduō wúfǎ gūliàng de yīnsù。
人类行为取决于许多无法估量的因素。
He appraised the situation carefully before acting.
Tā zài xíngdòng zhīqián zǐxì gūliàngle xíngshì。
他在行动之前仔细估量了形势。
Never underestimate womanpower
决不要低估妇女的力量。
News sources reflected uncritical estimates of the number of juvenile addicts.
Xīn de shùjù láiyuán fǎnyìngle duì qīngshàonián xīdúzhě shùliàng wú pīpàn lì de gūjì。
新的数据来源反映了对青少年吸毒者数量无批判力的估计。
He had vastly overestimated his resources.
Tā tài gāogū zìjǐ de zhìhuì hé néngliàng le。
他太高估自己的智慧和能量了。
这件家具请你估一估价。
Zhèjiàn jiājù qǐngnǐ gūyigū jià。
Evaluate this piece of furniture, please.
对他的能力应该有个正确的估价，不要从一个极端走到另一个极端。
Duì tā de nénglì yínggāi yǒu gè zhèngquè de gūjià，búyào cóngyígè jíduān zǒu dào lìngyígè jíduān。
You should make a correct evaluation of his ability. Don\'t go from one extreme to the other.
现在房产市场波动很大，房价很难准确预估。
Xiànzài fángchǎn shìchǎng bōdòng hěn dà，fángjià hěnnán zhǔnquè yùgū。
Nowadays, with the huge fluctuation in the real estate market, it is hard to predict housing prices.
业绩预估∣成交价高于预估价许多。
这幅古画估价10万元
应该正确估价自己
You estimate, I will offer your estimated value to the auction committee.
你估个价，我将把你的估价报给拍卖委员会。
an outside estimate
最高估价
a painting valued at ten thousand dollars
估价10000美元的一幅画
jewellery valued at around $10,000
估价在1万美元左右的珠宝
Your estimate was rejected by the seller.
你的估价单被卖家回绝了。
I have just received the appraisal of my home in the mail.
Wǒ gānggāng zài yóujiàn zhōng shōu dào le duì wǒ de zhùzhái de gūjià。
我刚刚在邮件中收到了对我的住宅的估价。
Our company assesses the property value for the city.
Wǒmen de gōngsī duì nàgè chéngshì de cáichǎn jiàzhí jìnxíngle gūjià。
我们的公司对那个城市的财产价值进行了估价。
We began to learn how to cost out inferior bids.
Wǒmen kāishǐ xuéxí rúhé duì lièshì chūjià jìnxíng gūjià。
我们开始学习如何对劣势出价进行估价。
The auditor did not attend the stocktake or check the valuations.
Nà wèi shěnjìyuán méiyǒu cānjiā kùcún pándiǎn huòzhě héduì gūjià。
那位审计员没有参加库存盘点或者核对估价。
The valuation of this property is much too high.
Zhè jiàn wùpǐn de gūjià guò gāo。
这件物品的估价过高。
The assessment for repairs outraged the club\'s membership.
Wéixiū gūjià lìng Jùlèbù quántǐ huìyuán jíwéi nǎonù。
维修估价令俱乐部全体会员极为恼怒。
He approximated the cost to only a few dollars per liter.
Tā gūjì jiàgé zhǐshì měi shēng jǐ měiyuán。
他估计价格只是每升几美元。
He got an estimate from the car repair shop.
Tā cóng qìchē xiūlǐchǎng dédàole gūjì jiàgé。
他从汽车修理厂得到了估计价格。
He tried to estimate the value of the produce at normal prices.
Tā shìtú gēnjù zhèngcháng jiàgé gūjì chū zhè jiàn chǎnpǐn de jiàzhí。
他试图根据正常价格估计出这件产品的价值。
The course packed so much in that it proved invaluable to my development as a teacher.
这门课程的内容很丰富，后来证明它对我教师生涯的发展有不可估量的价值。
The store\'s estimate of the antique was undervalued.
古董店把这件古董的价格估低了。
Estimating the cost of oil is quite a complex process.
Gūsuàn yóu de jiàgé shì yí gè xiāngdāng fùzá de guòchéng。
估算油的价格是一个相当复杂的过程。
I value that in round figures at $24,000.
Wǒ gūjì nà dàgài jiàzhí liǎngwàn sìqiān měiyuán。
我估计那大概价值两万四千美元。
Can you estimate the value of the painting?
你能估出这幅画的价格吗？
The judge will evaluate the worthiness of these claims.
Fǎguān huì pínggū zhèxiē suǒpéi de jiàzhí。
法官会评估这些索赔的价值。
Don\'t underestimate the value of this heirloom-you may sell it at a good price.
Búyào dīgū zhège chuánjiābǎo de jiàzhí，nǐ huòxǔ kěyǐ bǎ tā mài gè hǎojiàqián。
不要低估这个传家宝的价值，你或许可以把它卖个好价钱。
History scholars assessed his research on Qing Dynasty spirituality.
历史学家们评估了他对清代宗教研究的历史价值。
The interviewee will evaluate, judge and generally size us up, no matter what we do.
Bùguǎn wǒmen zěnme zuò，bèi miànshìzhě dōuhuì pínggū，pànduàn，bìng xùnsù duì wǒmen zuòchū yí gè píngjià。
不管我们怎么做，被面试者都会评估，判断，并迅速对我们作出一个评价。
I estimate the cost of repairing will be far more than the actual value of the car.
Wǒ gūjì xiūlǐfèi huì yuǎnyuǎn chāoguò qìchē de shíjì jiàzhí。
我估计修理费会远远超过汽车的实际价值。
这些估计虽然不是绝对保险，但也八九不离十。
Zhèxiē gūjì suīrán búshì juéduì bǎoxiǎn，dàn yě bājiǔbùlíshí。
These calculations, though not always one hundred percent accurate, were never far out.

bǎoshǒu de gūjì 
a conservative estimate
初步估计
chūbùgūjì
preliminary estimates
粗略估计
cūlüè gūjì 
a rough estimate
大概的估计
dàgài de gūjì 
a rough estimate

qīngxǐng de gūjì dāngqián de xíngshì

gūjì cuòwù
miscalculate

guò gāo gūjì

过低估计
guò dī gūjì

估计得走那么三、四个钟头才能到。
Gūjì děi zǒu nàme sān、sì gè zhōng tóu cái néngdào。
I think it will take three or four hours to get there.
对成绩和缺点作恰如其分的估计
duì chéngjì hé quēdiǎn zuò qiàrúqífèn de gūjì
make an appropriate estimate of the achievements and shortcomings
对情势作出估计
duì qíngshì zuòchū gūjì
size up the situation
通盘估计
tōngpán gūjì 
an all-round estimate
约略的估计
yuēlüè de gūjì
a rough (or approximate) estimate
正确估计客观形势
zhèngquè gūjì kèguān xíngshì 
accurately appraise the objective situation
我们对困难要有足够的估计。
Wǒmen duì kùnnan yào yǒu zúgòu de gūjì。
We must take full account of our difficulties.
我估计事情不会这么简单，肯定有别情。
Wǒ gūjìshì qíng búhuì zhème jiǎndān，kěndìng yǒu biéqíng。
I don’t think that it is so easy, there must be something else.
他手术后依然昏昏沉沉，估计是麻醉药的残效还没有完全消失。
Tā shǒushù hòu yīrán hūnhūnchénchén，gūjì shì mázuìyào de cánxiào hái méiyǒu wánquán xiāoshī。
He still felt dazed after the operation. The narcotic must still be effecting him.
这台机器的信号总是不好，我估计是传输线的问题。
Zhètái jīqì de xìnhào zǒngshì bùhǎo，wǒ gūjì shì chuánshūxiàn de wèntí。
The signal of this machine is always bad. I guess something is wrong with the transmission lines.
据医生估计，这种现象是由体内代偿引起的。
Jù yīshēng gūjì，zhèzhǒng xiàn xiàng shì yóu tǐnèi dàicháng yǐnqǐ de。
The doctor estimated that the phenomenon was caused by intracorporal compensation.
这座孤城估计也坚守不了多久了。
Zhèzuò gūchéng gūjì yě jiānshǒu bùliǎo duōjiǔ le。
This isolated city may not remain for too long.
这座古堡看起来阴森恐怖的，估计很久没人进去过了。
Zhèzuò gǔbǎo kànqǐlái yīnsēn kǒngbù de，gūjì hěnjiǔ méi rén jìnqù guò le。
This ancient castle looks gloomy and terrifying. I guess it has been long since anyone went inside.
老先生已经归隐多年，估计很难再请他出山了。
Lǎoxiānshēng yǐjing guīyǐn duōnián，gūjì hěnnán zài qǐng tā chūshān le。
This old man has been dwelling in seclusion for many years. It is probably very difficult to bring him back to society.
窗户上都有哈气了，估计今天很冷。
Chuānghu shàng dōu yǒu hāqì le，gūjì jīntiān hěnlěng。
There is water vapor on the window, so it may be very cold outside today.
看他神志不清的样子，估计是喝醉了。
Kàn tā shénzhì bùqīng de yàngzi，gūjì shì hēzuì le。
Maybe he got dead drunk since he is in a coma.
现在的孩子估计没有几个知道混合面儿是什么的了。
Xiànzài de háizi gūjì méiyǒu jǐgè zhīdào hùnhémiànr shì shénme de le。
I guess few of today\'s children know what mixed flour is.
他的关节积水，估计要告别体育赛场了。
Tā de guānjié jīshuǐ，gūjì yào gàobié tǐyù sàichǎng le。
He has accumulated liquid in his joints, so he is likely to say goodbye to the sports field.
擂主的实力很强，估计攻擂者要无功而返了。
Lèizhǔ de shílì hěnqiáng，gūjì gōnglèizhě yào wúgōng ér fǎn le。
The challenged is very powerful. I am afraid the challenger will end in vain.
看她冷眉冷眼的样子，估计这事是办不成了。
Kàn tā lěngméi lěngyǎn de yàngzi，gūjì zhè shì shì bàn bùchéng le。
Judging from her cold expression, I am afraid the affair will end in vain.
这件事情听起来就没边儿，估计很难办成。
Zhèjiàn shìqing tīngqǐlái jiù méi biānr，gūjì hěnnán bànchéng。
This matter sounds groundless, and may be hard to accomplish.
看他的睡相就知道他睡得很沉，估计又做好梦了呢。
Kàn tā de shuì xiàng jiù zhīdào tā shuì de hěnchén，gūjì yòu zuò hǎomèng le ne。
Look at his posture in sleeping, and you\'ll know that he is fast asleep. Maybe he is having another nice dream.
估计今天是踢蹬不完这些活了，明天再接着干吧。
Gūjì jīntiān shì tīdēng bùwán zhèxiē huó le，míngtiān zài jiē zhe gàn ba。
I guess the job can\'t be finished today, so we\'ll go on with it tomorrow.
按期完成这项任务，你估计需要投工多少？
Ànqī wánchéng zhèxiàng rènwù，nǐ gūjì xūyào tóugōng duōshǎo？
How many labor days do you think it will take to finish the work on time?
戏曲音乐响起来了，估计这部戏快结束了。
Xìqǔ yīnyuè xiǎng qǐlái le，gūjì zhèbù xì kuài jiéshù le。
We can hear the opera music now, which indicates that the show will be over soon.
箱子里装的全是现钞，估计足足有五十万。

The case is full of cash with a value which may exceed 500,000.

The first whitish rays have appeared above the horizon, it may be six o\'clock now.
不远处传来象脚鼓的声音，估计前面就是傣族的聚居地了。
Bùyuǎnchù chuánlái xiàng jiǎogǔ de shēngyīn，gūjì qiánmiàn jiùshì dǎizú de jùjūdì le。
I can hear foot drums so we must be close tho a Dai home.
今年是香蕉生长的小年，估计收成不会好。
Jīnnián shì xiāngjiāo shēngzhǎng de xiǎonián，gūjì shōuchéng búhuì hǎo。
Today is a non-bearing year for bananas, so there is not going to be a harvest.
你的鞋跟儿可够高的，估计有五厘米。
Nǐ de xiégēnr kě gòu gāo de，gūjì yǒu wǔ límǐ。
Your shoe heels are really tall, as high as 5 centimeters, I guess.
他的熊脾气估计是永远都改不了的。
Tā de xióngpíqi gūjì shì yǒngyuǎn dōu gǎibùliǎo de。
It seems that his bad temper would never change.
他衣服上有血渍，估计是杀猪的时候弄的。
Tā yīfu shàng yǒu xuèzì，gūjì shì shāzhū de shíhou nòng de。
There are some bloodstains on his clothes. They must be from the pig butchering.
乞丐出去寻摸吃的了，估计一时半会回不来。
Qǐgài chūqù xúnmō chī de le，gūjì yìshí bànhuì huí bùlái。
The beggar goes out to seek for food. He won\'t come back for a while.
他长得很雅气，估计出身于书香门第。

He has good manners; maybe he is from a literary family.
节目演火了，估计演期要延长了。
Jiémù yǎnhuǒ le，gūjì yǎnqī yào yáncháng le。
The program is popular now, it will be extended.
她扬鞭而去，估计是不会回来了。
Tā yángbiān érqù，gūjì shì búhuì huílái le。
She went away with a swagger, and probably won\'t come back .
双方已经签订了意向书，估计不久将签订正式协议。

The two party have signed a letter of intent, by my reckoning, they will sign the official agreement soon.
渔漂动了几下，估计是又有鱼上钩了。
Yúpiāo dòng le jǐ xià，gūjì shì yòu yǒu yú shànggōu le。
The float has just moved several times. Probably there is a fish on the hook again.
工匠们正在制作花瓶原坯，估计不久就能烧制了。
Gōngjiàngmen zhèngzài zhìzuò huāpíng yuánpī，gūjì bùjiǔ jiùnéng shāozhì le。
The craftsmen are making original moulds of the vases; it probably won\'t take long before they begin to bake them.
这筐梨约摸有300斤，估计能卖到500元。
Zhè kuāng lí yuēmō yǒu sānbǎijīn，gūjì néng màidào wǔbǎiyuán。
This basket of pears is probably 300 jin in weight; I guess that they can be sold for 500 yuan.
天空布满了云翳，估计是要下雨了。
Tiānkōng bùmǎn le yúnyì，gūjì shì yào xiàyǔ le。
The sky is covered with clouds. It is probably going to rain.
如果这次我们队在主场，估计会取胜。
Rúguǒ zhècì wǒmen duì zài zhǔchǎng，gūjì huì qǔshèng。
We may probably win if this game is held at our home field.
他家的用水量显示为零，估计是流量计出了问题。
Tā jiā de yòngshuǐliàng xiǎnshì wéi líng，gūjì shì liúliàngjì chū le wèntí。
It shows that the quantity of water used is zero. His flowmeter must be out of order.
我估计明天能完工。
Wǒ gūjì míngtiān néngwángōng。
I reckon we should be able to finish tomorrow.
这是个保守的估计。
Zhèshìgè bǎoshǒude gūjì。
This is a conservative estimate.
那种手机样式太旧，估计你相不上。

That style of mobile phone is very old. I reckon you won\'t like it.

life expectancy

我估计这段路程有500英里。

我估计不会花费超过300美元，但是我支付的真实数额却高得多。

这块地的大小很难估计。

以前他的德语很流利，但我觉得他现在的水平已经大不如前了，估计是缺少练习造成的。
He sized up the situation immediately.
他当即估计了一下形势。

你估计那幅画在拍卖会上能卖多少钱？

下午约四点钟的时候，我们看见了陆地，就在向南偏西的方向朝我们这边移动，据估计，它离我们只有10里之远。
More than 5,500 people have died in the earthquake, an estimated 58 590 are injured.
有5500多人死于地震，估计有58590人受伤。

估计损失为3亿英镑

我估计…

研究估计今年有近1.2万只信天翁死于南非的拖网捕鱼作业。

我估计当个网络红人的感觉会不错。

我估计他不过是个骗子。
Several methods of curve-fitting data yield consistent estimates of parameter values.
几种曲线似合数据的方法均能得到参数值的一致性估计。

据估计，股市可能会因这家公司的破产而震荡。

我估计修理费会远远超过汽车的实际价值。
I think I might be late home again.
Wǒ gūjì wǒ yòu děi wǎn huíjiā。
我估计我又得晚回家。
The region is estimated to have three million drug addicts.
Jù gūjì，zhège dìqū yōngyǒu sānbǎiwàngè yǐnjūnzǐ。
据估计，这个地区拥有三百万个瘾君子。
The experts are anticipating a raise in taxes.
Zhuānjiā gūjì shuìshōu huì zēngjiā。
专家估计税收会增加。
I anticipated the mistakes before it happened.
Zài cuòwù fāshēng zhīqián wǒ yǐjīng gūjì dào le。
在错误发生之前我已经估计到了。
He approximated the cost to only a few dollars per liter.
Tā gūjì jiàgé zhǐshì měi shēng jǐ měiyuán。
他估计价格只是每升几美元。
By conservative estimates, 2.5 million people die each year from smoking.
Bǎoshǒu gūjì，měinián èrbǎiwǔshí wàn rén sǐyú xīyān。
保守估计，每年二百五十万人死于吸烟。
Such estimators converge at a rate of 2/5.
Zhèxiē gūjìzhí zài xiélǜ wéi wǔfēnzhī\'èr chù shōuliǎn。
这些估计值在斜率为2/5处收敛。
Extremely crude estimates suggest some improvement over the last two years.
Fēicháng chūbù de gūjì biǎomíng guòqù liǎng nián yǒuxiē jìnbù。
非常初步的估计表明过去两年有些进步。
Accurate estimates of the marginal costs of production are often very difficult to obtain.
Jīngzhǔn de biānjì shēngchǎnchéngběn de gūjì shì hěn nán dádào de。
精准的边际生产成本的估计是很难达到的。
The Government reckons it will cost about £4 million to implement.
Zhèngfǔ gūjì jiāng hàozī yuē sìbǎiwàn yīngbàng qù zhíxíng（cǐ rènwù）。
政府估计将耗资约四百万英镑去执行（此任务）。
I reckon he\'s pretty homesick to tell the truth.
Wǒ gūjì tā shuōleshíhuà，tā tài xiǎng jiā le。
我估计他说了实话，他太想家了。
Recent surveys show previous estimates of whale numbers to be wildly optimistic.
Zuìjìn de diàocháxiǎnshì xiānqián duìyú jīngyú shùmù de gūjì tài guò lèguān le。
最近的调查显示先前对于鲸鱼数目的估计太过乐观了。
One estimate puts the cost in terms of sickness absence alone at over $700 million a year.
Gūjì měi nián dān yīn bìng quēgǎng de chéngběn jiù chāoguò qī yì měiyuán。
估计每年单因病缺岗的成本就超过7亿美元。
The paintings were expected to fetch over a million dollars.
Zhèxiē huìhuà zuòpǐn gūjì néng shòuchū yībǎiwàn Měiyuán yǐshàng。
这些绘画作品估计能售出一百万美元以上。
He figured it was possible to make money in this line of business.
Tā gūjì zài zhège hángyè yǒu kěnéng zhuànqián。
他估计在这个行业有可能赚钱。
Can you guess how much time it will take for you complete it?
Nǐ néng gūjì yíxià wánchéng zhè xiàng gōngzuò xūyào duō cháng shíjiān ma？
你能估计一下完成这项工作需要多长时间吗？
There are about thirty at a guess.
Cūlüè gūjì，dàgài yǒu sānshí gè。
粗略估计，大概有30个。
His assets are estimated at 4.5 billion dollars.
Tā de zīchǎn gūjì yǒu sìshíwǚ yì měiyuán。
他的资产估计有45亿美元。
He seems to have gotten the measure of things now.
Xiànzài tā sìhū yǐjīng gūjì dàole zhèxiē shìqing。
现在他似乎已经估计到了这些事情。
I value that in round figures at $24,000.
Wǒ gūjì nà dàgài jiàzhí liǎngwàn sìqiān měiyuán。
我估计那大概价值两万四千美元。
Judging by the figures quoted above, that estimate is probably too low.
Jù shàngmiàn suǒ yǐnshù de shùzì lái kàn， gūjì kěnéng tài dī。
据上面所引述的数字来看，估计可能太低。
Richard Jones is back in the reckoning at last after a long injury lay off.
Jù gūjì，Lǐchádé·Qióngsī zài shòushāng chángshíjiān tíngzhǐ gōngzuò hòu zuìzhōng háishì huì huílái。
据估计，理查德·琼斯在受伤长时间停止工作后最终还是会回来。
You can estimate your maximum heart rate by subtracting your age from 220.
Tōngguò yòng èrèrlíng zhōng jiǎn qù niánlíng，nǐ kěyǐ gūjì chū zìjǐ de zuìdà xīnlǜ。
通过用220中减去年龄，你可以估计出自己的最大心率。
Estimates for the losses in the earthquake range as high as $2 billion.
Dìzhèn sǔnshī gūjì gāo dá 20 yì měiyuán。
地震损失估计高达20亿美元。
Estimates of the city\'s loss on that job ranged as high as a million dollars.
Gāi chéngshì zài nà xiàng zuòyè shàng de gūjì sǔnshī gāodá shù bǎi wàn měiyuán。
该城市在那项作业上的估计损失高达数百万美元。
He tried to estimate the value of the produce at normal prices.
Tā shìtú gēnjù zhèngcháng jiàgé gūjì chū zhè jiàn chǎnpǐn de jiàzhí。
他试图根据正常价格估计出这件产品的价值。
He got an estimate from the car repair shop.

他从汽车修理厂得到了估计价格。
A rough idea how long it would take.
Duì xūyào duō cháng shíjiān de cūlüè gūjì。

Wǒ gūjì zhè gāodù děi yǒu yìbǎi yīngchǐ。
我估计这高度得有100英尺。
I estimate this chicken to weigh three pounds.
Wǒ gūjì zhè zhī jī yǒu sān bàng zhòng。
我估计这只鸡有3磅重。
If this trend continues it is not reasonable to expect the eventual collapse of the stock market.

假如这趋势持续下去，估计股票市场会最终垮掉。
He evaluated his chances for survival rather pessimistically.
Tā duì zìjǐ huóxiàlái de kěnéngxìng gūjì de xiāngdāng bēiguān。
他对自己活下来的可能性估计得相当悲观。
We estimated the number of demonstrators conservatively at 200,000..

我们保守地估计，示威者的人数达到了200,000。
We estimated the answer stochastically.
Wǒmen suíjī gūjìle yíxià zhège dá\'àn。
我们随机估计了一下这个答案。
News sources reflected uncritical estimates of the number of juvenile addicts.

新的数据来源反映了对青少年吸毒者数量无批判力的估计。
Computationally, this is a tricky problem.
Jù gūjì，zhè shì yí gè hěn jíshǒu de wèntí。

The entire project is estimated to cost $5.6bn.
zhěnggè xiàngmù de chéngběn gūjì wéi 56 yì měiyuán。

The accountant\'s estimate for the project was on target.

那位审计员没有参加库存盘点或者核对估价。
The scheme was evaluated using a matched control sample of cases from adjacent areas.
Zhè xiàng jìhuà shì tōngguò yǔ fùjìn dìqū xiāng pǐpèi de duìzhào yàngběn ànlì jìnxíng duìbǐ lái pínggū de。
这项计划是通过与附近地区相匹配的对照样本案例进行对比来评估的。
青菜剩得不多了，他准备估堆儿卖了。

Without many green vegetables left, he planned to sell them in piles.
这些白菜估堆儿卖。
我估计事情不会这么简单，肯定有别情。

Homes in our town are reappraised every five years and taxes are increased accordingly.
Zài wǒmen de chéngshì，měi wǔnián duì jiātíng chóngxīn pínggū yí cì cáichǎn，ránhòu yǐcǐ wéi biāozhǔn jìnxíng zhēngshuì。
在我们的城市，每五年对家庭重新评估一次财产，然后以此为标准进行征税。

Our company assesses the property value for the city.
Wǒmen de gōngsī duì nàgè chéngshì de cáichǎn jiàzhí jìnxíngle gūjià。
我们的公司对那个城市的财产价值进行了估价。
At worst, a poor rating can put a company out of business.
Zuì huài de kěnéng shì，pínggū guò dī huì shǐ gōngsī pòchǎn。
最坏的可能是，评估过低会使公司破产。
In theory, the share market may get agitated by the corporation\'s bankruptcy.
据估计，股市可能会因这家公司的破产而震荡。
估测的数字不准，你们最好亲自去测量一下。
Gūcè de shùzì bùzhǔn，nǐmen zuìhǎo qīnzì qù cèliáng yíxià。
The estimated number is not very accurate, you\'d better measure it yourselves.
结局很难估测。
你估一估这堆西红柿有几斤。
Nǐ gūyigū zhè duī xīhóngshì yǒu jǐ jīn。
Can you tell how many jin of tomatoes there are in this heap?
这件家具请你估一估价。
Zhèjiàn jiājù qǐngnǐ gūyigū jià。
Evaluate this piece of furniture, please.
这些估计虽然不是绝对保险，但也八九不离十。

These calculations, though not always one hundred percent accurate, were never far out.
保守的估计
bǎoshǒu de gūjì 
a conservative estimate
不可估量的损失
bùkě gūliáng de sǔnshī 
an immeasurable loss

chūbùgūjì

cūlüè gūjì

大概的估计
dàgài de gūjì 
a rough estimate
这篇她翻译得不错，过去我们低估了她的英语水平。
Zhèpiān tā fānyì de búcuò，guòqù wǒmen dīgū le tā de yīngyǔ shuǐpíng。
She translated this piece quite well, We had underestimated her English level.

Zhèkuài dì gūchǎn bābǎi jīn。

gūjì cuòwù
miscalculate

guò gāo gūjì

guò dī gūjì

gūliángshuāngfānglìliang de duìbǐ

Nǐ gūliángtā zhèngduōshao?

Wǒ gūmo zhe tā yuèdǐ jiù nénghuílai。

gūsuàn chǎnliàng

gūsuàn dào jǐzhǒng kěnéngxìng

对他的能力应该有个正确的估价，不要从一个极端走到另一个极端。
Duì tā de nénglì yínggāi yǒu gè zhèngquè de gūjià，búyào cóngyígè jíduān zǒu dào lìngyígè jíduān。

估计得走那么三、四个钟头才能到。

I think it will take three or four hours to get there.

zīchǎn pínggū

duì chéngjì hé quēdiǎn zuò qiàrúqífèn de gūjì

对情势作出估计
duì qíngshì zuòchū gūjì

tōngpán gūjì 
an all-round estimate
约略的估计
yuēlüè de gūjì

正确估计客观形势
zhèngquè gūjì kèguān xíngshì

Wǒmen duì kùnnan yào yǒu zúgòu de gūjì。

估量
gūliáng
appraise; estimate; assess; reckon
我估计事情不会这么简单，肯定有别情。

I don’t think that it is so easy, there must be something else.

He still felt dazed after the operation. The narcotic must still be effecting him.
这台机器的信号总是不好，我估计是传输线的问题。

The signal of this machine is always bad. I guess something is wrong with the transmission lines.
你俩粗估出来的数字怎么差距这么大。

There is a huge disparity between the numbers you two roughly estimated.
据医生估计，这种现象是由体内代偿引起的。

The doctor estimated that the phenomenon was caused by intracorporal compensation.
唉，我们高估了他的办事能力！
Ài，wǒmen gāogū le tā de bànshì nénglì！
Oh, we overestimated his capability of handling things.
估测的数字不准，你们最好亲自去测量一下。

The estimated number is not very accurate, you\'d better measure it yourselves.

Without many green vegetables left, he planned to sell them in piles.

This isolated city may not remain for too long.
这座古堡看起来阴森恐怖的，估计很久没人进去过了。
Zhèzuò gǔbǎo kànqǐlái yīnsēn kǒngbù de，gūjì hěnjiǔ méi rén jìnqù guò le。
This ancient castle looks gloomy and terrifying. I guess it has been long since anyone went inside.
老先生已经归隐多年，估计很难再请他出山了。
Lǎoxiānshēng yǐjing guīyǐn duōnián，gūjì hěnnán zài qǐng tā chūshān le。
This old man has been dwelling in seclusion for many years. It is probably very difficult to bring him back to society.
窗户上都有哈气了，估计今天很冷。
Chuānghu shàng dōu yǒu hāqì le，gūjì jīntiān hěnlěng。
There is water vapor on the window, so it may be very cold outside today.
看他神志不清的样子，估计是喝醉了。
Kàn tā shénzhì bùqīng de yàngzi，gūjì shì hēzuì le。
Maybe he got dead drunk since he is in a coma.
现在的孩子估计没有几个知道混合面儿是什么的了。
Xiànzài de háizi gūjì méiyǒu jǐgè zhīdào hùnhémiànr shì shénme de le。
I guess few of today\'s children know what mixed flour is.
他的关节积水，估计要告别体育赛场了。
Tā de guānjié jīshuǐ，gūjì yào gàobié tǐyù sàichǎng le。
He has accumulated liquid in his joints, so he is likely to say goodbye to the sports field.
擂主的实力很强，估计攻擂者要无功而返了。
Lèizhǔ de shílì hěnqiáng，gūjì gōnglèizhě yào wúgōng ér fǎn le。
The challenged is very powerful. I am afraid the challenger will end in vain.
看她冷眉冷眼的样子，估计这事是办不成了。
Kàn tā lěngméi lěngyǎn de yàngzi，gūjì zhè shì shì bàn bùchéng le。
Judging from her cold expression, I am afraid the affair will end in vain.
今年的总利润毛估大概在三十万元左右。
Jīnnián de zǒnglìrùn máogū dàgài zài sānshí wàn yuán zuǒyòu。
A rough estimate puts the overall profit for this year at 300,000 yuan.
这件事情听起来就没边儿，估计很难办成。
Zhèjiàn shìqing tīngqǐlái jiù méi biānr，gūjì hěnnán bànchéng。
This matter sounds groundless, and may be hard to accomplish.
每年的水旱灾害都会给农民带来不可估量的损失。
Měinián de shuǐhàn zāihài dōuhuì gěi nóngmín dàilái bùkě gūliàng de sǔnshī。
The flood and drought each year brought incalculable damage to farmers.
看他的睡相就知道他睡得很沉，估计又做好梦了呢。
Kàn tā de shuì xiàng jiù zhīdào tā shuì de hěnchén，gūjì yòu zuò hǎomèng le ne。
Look at his posture in sleeping, and you\'ll know that he is fast asleep. Maybe he is having another nice dream.
估计今天是踢蹬不完这些活了，明天再接着干吧。
Gūjì jīntiān shì tīdēng bùwán zhèxiē huó le，míngtiān zài jiē zhe gàn ba。
I guess the job can\'t be finished today, so we\'ll go on with it tomorrow.
按期完成这项任务，你估计需要投工多少？

I can hear foot drums so we must be close tho a Dai home.
今年是香蕉生长的小年，估计收成不会好。

He had cited highway, tax and rating cases in support of the limited jurisdiction principle.
Tā yǐnyòngle gāosùgōnglù、shuìshōu jí pínggū ànjiàn yǐ zhèngmíng xiànzhì guǎnxiáquán yuánzé。
他引用了高速公路、税收及评估案件以证明限制管辖权原则。
By making sin a purely external thing its seriousness was minimized.
Ruò shì zuìniè chúncuì shì yì zhǒng wàizài de shìqing de huà，nà jiù dīgūle tā de yánzhòngxìng le。
若视罪孽纯粹是一种外在的事情的话，那就低估了它的严重性了。
Standards are a must for effective appraisal.

不可估量的损失
bùkě gūliáng de sǔnshī 
an immeasurable loss
每年的水旱灾害都会给农民带来不可估量的损失。

减肥膳食

如果你想减肥，就不要吃富含动物脂肪的食物。

95%的这些减肥食谱都不起作用。

肥水不流外人田，这项工程咱们自己包下吧。

Rich water should be kept in one\'s own fields, let\'s contract this job ourselves.
看着加菲猫那肥头大耳的样子，观众忍不住都乐了。
Kàn zhe jiāfēimāo nà féitóudà\'ěr de yàngzi，guānzhòng rěn bú zhù dōu lè le。
The audience are amused by Garfield\'s fat and funny looks.
这样的肥土，庄稼肯定能长好。
Zhèyàng de féitǔ，zhuāngjia kěndìng néng zhǎng hǎo。
The plants will grow well in such fertile land.
她肥腴端庄，就像个唐代的美女。
Tā féiyú duānzhuāng，jiù xiàng gè tángdài de měinǚ。
Her plumpness and elegance made her a beauty in the Tang dynasty.
这块肥腴的土地，孕育着庄稼人的希望！
Zhèkuài féiyú de tǔdì，yùnyù zhe zhuāngjiàrén de xīwàng！
This fertile land bears the hopes of the farmers.
她不希望自己的理想都成为肥皂泡，所以加倍努力。
Tā bùxīwàng zìjǐ de lǐxiǎng dōu chéngwéi féizàopào，suǒyǐ jiābèi nǔlì。
She works hard to make her dreams come true.
他提粪箕子下地，帮助大人们往地里施肥。
Tā tí fènjīzi xiàdì，bāngzhù dàrénmen wǎng dì lǐ shīféi。
He carried the manure scoop to the field to help the adults fertilize the field.
这些肥料还未腐熟。
Zhèxiē féiliào hái wèi fǔshú。
These fertilizers haven\'t thoroughly decomposed.
施这种化肥，可以使水稻复壮。
Shī zhèzhǒng huàféi，kěyǐ shǐ shuǐdào fùzhuàng。
Fertilizer of this kind can rejuvenate rice.
这件衣服实在是太肥了，我穿在身上直逛游。
Zhèj iàn yīfu shízai shì tài féi le，wǒ chuānzài shēnshàng zhí guàngyóu。
This dress is so big that it hangs on me.
滚肥的牛犊一定能卖个好价钱。
Gǔnféi de niúdú yídìng néng mài gè hǎo jiàqián。
A round, and fat calf can sell for a high price.
这些牛羊肥得滚瓜流油，牧民们可高兴了。
Zhèxiē niúyáng féi de gǔnguā liúyóu，mùmínmen kě gāoxìng le。
The herdsmen are excited that the flocks of cattle, and sheep are round and fat.
这家公司出售河肥。
Zhèjiā gōngsī chūshòu héféi。
This company sells river silt that is used as manure.
褐土是一种肥力较高的土。
Hètǔ shì yìzhǒng féilì jiàogāo de tǔ。
Brown earth is of high fertility.
他买了块后暸肉，肥瘦合宜，正好做红烧肉。
Tā mǎi le kuài hòuliàoròu，féishòu héyí，zhènghǎo zuò hóngshāoròu。
He bought a piece of haunch meat with neither too much fat nor muscle. It was suitable to cook bouilli.
他说绕呼啦圈可以减肥，所以我就买了一个来试试。
Tā shuō rào hūlāquān kěyǐ jiǎnféi，suǒyǐ wǒ jiù mǎi le yígè lái shìshì。
He said using a hola hoop could help me lose weight, so I bought one.
花生饼对于植物生长是一种很好的肥料。
Huāshēngbǐng duìyú zhíwù shēngzhǎng shì yìzhǒng hěnhǎo de féiliào。
Caky peanut residue is good fertilizer for plant growth.
乱吃减肥药对人体的危害很大。
Luànchī jiǎnféiyào duì réntǐ de wēihài hěndà。
Taking obesity drugs without prescription is harmful to one\'s body.
菜园窖肥是一件很麻烦的事。
Càiyuán jiàoféi shì yíjiàn hěnmáfan de shì。
It is time-consuming to make water-logged compost in the vegetable garden.
他把窖肥洒向麦田，让麦子得到更多的营养。
Tā bǎ jiàoféi sǎ xiàng màitián，ràng màizi dédào gèngduō de yíngyǎng。
He poured the water-logged compost into the wheat field in order to nourish the wheat.
去年起，他们种地时开始试用菌肥，效果良好。
Qùnián qǐ，tāmen zhòngdì shí kāishǐ shìyòng jūnféi，xiàoguǒ liánghǎo。
Since last year, they have put on a trial of bacterial fertilizers when farming. It turns out to be very good.
他们的地刚上过栏肥，种出来的庄稼格外壮实。
Tāmen de dì gāng shàngguò lánféi，zhòng chūlái de zhuāngjià géwài zhuàngshí。
They have spread barnyard manure, so the crops are especially hardy.
这顿利口的饭菜让我的减肥计划又泡汤了。
Zhè dùn lìkǒu de fàncài ràng wǒ de jiǎnféi jìhuà yòu pàotāng le。
The delicious food made my plan to lose weight fail again.
这种磷肥的主要原料就是磷灰石。
Zhèzhǒng línféi de zhǔyào yuánliào jiùshì línhuīshí。
The main material of the phosphate fertilizer is apatite.
我看着一派绿肥红瘦的景象，不禁黯然神伤。
Wǒ kàn zhe yípài lǜféi hóngshòu de jǐng xiàng，bùjīn ànrán shénshāng。
The lingering spring makes me depressed.
螺旋藻有减肥的作用，受到许多女士的欢迎。
Luóxuánzǎo yǒu jiǎnféi de zuòyòng，shòudào xǔduō nǚshì de huānyíng。
Spiral alga has a slimming effect, it is popular with many women.
在幼苗生长的关键时期，你应该多施一些镁肥。
Zài yòumiáo shēngzhǎng de guānjiàn shíqī，nǐ yīnggāi duō shī yìxiē měiféi。
In the key phase of growing seedlings, you should apply more fertilizer containing magnesium.
如今大力提倡种地使用农家肥，所以村里又建了2个新的沤粪池子。
Rújīn dàlì tíchàng zhòngdì shǐyòng nóngjiāféi，suǒyǐ cūn lǐ yòu jiàn le liǎnggè xīn de òufèn chízi。
Nowadays, farmyard manure has been advocated for cultivation, so the villagers built two more waterlogged manure pits.

Chángqī hē pǔ\'ěrchá yǒu jiǎnféi de gōngxiào。
If you keep drinking Pu\'er tea every day for a long time you will lose weight.
他过着轻裘肥马的生活，怎么能知道民间的疾苦？
Tā guò zhe qīngqiú féimǎ de shēnghuó，zěnme néng zhīdào mínjiān de jíkǔ？
They lead a luxurious life, how can they know the hardships of the people?
肥皂是生活中最常用的乳化剂。

Soap is the most commonly used emulsifier.
你该给地里的庄稼上肥了。
Nǐ gāi gěi dì lǐ de zhuāngjia shàngféi le。
It is time for you to apply fertilizer to the crops.
我正在减肥，坚决不吃甜品。

I\'m on a diet, so I don\'t eat desserts.

The soil layer of this village is rich in nutrients, and thus suitable for cultivation.
这些灶土可以用作土肥，你不要轻易扔掉。

影片在高潮处突然定格，使观众迷惑不解。

如堕云雾(比喻迷惑不解，不知所措)
迷惑不解。
When I walked in, all the girls in the office were in a tizzy.
我走进去的时候,办公室里的 所有女孩儿都非常迷惑不解。
Please avoid using abbreviations that may be confusing to everyone but the author.

请避免使用那些会令除作者本人之外的所有人都迷惑不解的缩略语。

孩子们迷惑不解。

demagogic slogans

perplexed and uneasy

huòluàn rénxīn 
confuse and poison people\'s minds

huòluàn jūnxīn 
undermine the morale of an army

búhuòzhīnián
the age of forty (from Confucius\' saying 四十而不惑 &quot;At forty I came to be free from doubts&quot;)

nián yú búhuò

zàoyáo huòzhòng
fabricate rumours to mislead people

shānhuò

对某事感到困惑

对于为什么…感到困惑
to cast a spell on sb
[witch+] 用咒语迷惑某人
to be thrown into turmoil/confusion
陷入混乱/迷惑
to wonder about sth
对某事感到疑惑
I have a weak will and I can\'t resist temptations.
我的意志薄弱，禁不起诱惑。
The child watched his mother with unsure eyes.
孩子注视着他的母亲，眼里流露出惶惑的神色。

听说大城市是一个充满诱惑的花花世界。

他直到看了心理医生才解除了心中的疑惑。
His confusion in discerning justice and injustice also confuses many other people.
他对正义与非正义的迷惑也困扰着其他人。

尽管他抗拒诱惑的能力很强，他还是在没人看到的时候多吃了一个多纳圈。
When I walked in, all the girls in the office were in a tizzy.
我走进去的时候,办公室里的 所有女孩儿都非常迷惑不解。

The girl was tempted into eating an entire container of ice cream.
Tā dǐkàng búzhù yòuhuò，chīguāngle zhěnghé bīngqílín。
她抵抗不住诱惑，吃光了整盒冰淇淋。
The thought of being with her alone is a temptation I cannot face.
Xiǎng hé tā dāndú zài yìqǐ shì wǒ wúfǎ kàngjù de yòuhuò。
想和她单独在一起是我无法抗拒的诱惑。
He admits that the £50,000 bonus is a big temptation.
Tā chéngrèn，wǔwàn yīngbàng de jiǎngjīn shì gè bù xiǎo de yòuhuò。
他承认，50,000英镑的奖金是个不小的诱惑。
He tried to run away from the temptation.

智者不惑
Zhìzhě bú huò
The wise are free from perplexities.
不惑之年
búhuòzhīnián
the age of forty (from Confucius\' saying 四十而不惑 &quot;At forty I came to be free from doubts&quot;)
年逾不惑
nián yú búhuò
be over forty
进入不惑之年的他仍然在努力学习新的知识，适应新的环境。
Jìnrù búhuò zhī nián de tā réngrán zài nǔlì xuéxí xīn de zhīshi，shìyīng xīn de huánjìng。
Though in his 40s, he still tries to learn new things to adapt to the new environment.

huánɡhuòbù\'ān 
perplexed and uneasy
困惑不解

feel puzzled
感到迷惑不解
gǎndào míhuòbùjiě 
feel puzzled; feel perplexed
疑惑不解
yíhuò bùjiě 
feel puzzled; have doubts

潮水般的问题使她困惑不解。
The explanation was circuitous and puzzling.
Zhège jiěshì hěn yūqū，ràng rén kùnhuòbùjiě。
这个解释很迂曲，让人困惑不解。
He wondered bleakly.
Tā míhuòbùjiě，xiǎnde hěn qīliáng。
他迷惑不解，显得很凄凉。
He admits that the £50,000 bonus is a big temptation.
Tā chéngrèn，wǔwàn yīngbàng de jiǎngjīn shì gè bù xiǎo de yòuhuò。
他承认，50,000英镑的奖金是个不小的诱惑。
You won\'t be tempted to rub out ideas.
Nǐ búhuì yīn shòudào yòuhuò ér fàngqì zhèxiē xiǎngfǎ。
你不会因受到诱惑而放弃这些想法。
Confusion caused his unfortunate misstep.
Míhuò zàochéng tā búxìng de shīzú。
迷惑造成他不幸的失足。
You will succumb to temptation, and probably more than once.
Nǐ jiāng shòudào yòuhuò，bìngqiě kěnéng bùzhǐ yí cì。
你将受到诱惑，并且可能不止一次。
The temptation to despair may become overwhelming.
Juéwàng de yòuhuò kěnéng huì shìbùkědǎng。
绝望的诱惑可能会势不可挡。
He looked at her, not wrathfully now, but quizzically.
Tā kànzhe tā，rújīn bú zài shì fènnù，érshì kùnhuò。
他看着她，如今不再是愤怒，而是困惑。
The sultriness of her look was unmistakable.
Tā liǎn shàng de yòuhuò biǎoqíng zài míngxiǎn búguò。
她脸上的诱惑表情再明显不过。
Shopaholics can never resist a bargain.
Gòuwùkuáng yǒngyuǎn bù néng dǐzhì dījià de yòuhuò。
购物狂永远不能抵制低价的诱惑。
We were tempted by the delicious-looking food.
Wǒmen dōu dǐdǎng búzhù wàiguān jīngměi de shíwù de yòuhuò。
我们都抵挡不住外观精美的食物的诱惑。
A seduction on my part would land us with the necessity to rise, bathe and dress, chat falsely about this and that, and emerge into the rest of the evening as though nothing had happened.
Duì wǒ éryán，yòuhuò guòhòu shì qǐchuáng、 xǐzǎo hé chuān yī，bù shuō shénme，xiàng shénme shì dōu méi fāshēng yíyàng líkāi。
对我而言，诱惑过后是起床、洗澡和穿衣，不说什么，像什么事都没发生一样离开。
Charlie had little luck in trying to keep his distance from the liquor store.
Chálǐ jīběn búdà kěnéng bǎituō jiǔlèi shāngdiàn duì tā de yòuhuò。
查理基本不大可能摆脱酒类商店对他的诱惑。
They did not want to confuse their audience with too much information.
Tāmen bù xīwàng yòng tài duō de xìnxī lái ràng tīngzhòng gǎndào kùnhuò。
他们不希望用太多的信息来让听众感到困惑。
You should not confuse your reader with technical terms or jargon.
Nǐ bù yīnggāi yòng zhuānyǒumíngcí huòzhě shùyǔ lái shǐ nǐ de dúzhě gǎndào kùnhuò。
你不应该用专有名词或者术语来使你的读者感到困惑。
娇嫩的幼苗
jiāonèn de yòumiáo 
delicate seedlings
在幼苗生长的关键时期，你应该多施一些镁肥。

In the key phase of growing seedlings, you should apply more fertilizer containing magnesium.

棉苗要及时喷洒农药，以避免发生虫害
苗族也有民族剧种，我们称之为苗戏。
Miáozú yě yǒu mínzú jùzhǒng，wǒmen chēngzhī wéi miáoxì。
The Miao ethnic group has their own type of traditional folk opera, which we call Miao opera.
他虽然是个苗族人，但是已经听不懂苗语了。
Tā suīrán shì gè miáozúrén，dànshì yǐjing tīng bùdǒng miáoyǔ le。
Though he belongs to the Miao ethnic group, he can no longer understand the Miao dialect.
苗族居住地区
Miáozú jūzhù dìqū
a region inhabited by the Miao nationality
这些苗绣上都绣有苗族人喜爱的动物造型。
Zhèxiē miáoxiù shàng dōu xiùyǒu miáozúrén xǐ\'àide dòngwù zàoxíng。
All of these embroideries by the Miao people have animal forms, which the Miao\'s like very much.

The child has great potential for long-distance running. Why doesn\'t the coach give him some special training?
他是个当总经理的苗子。
Tā shì gè dāng zǒngjīnglǐ de miáozi.
He\'s a managing director in the making.
她是个当记者的好苗子。
Tā shì gè dāng jìzhě de hǎo miáozi.
She\'s a budding young journalist.
用这种方法教育孩子，简直是拔苗助长。

Teaching children in this way simply means applying too much pressure and damaging them.

Tā kàndào tā kuàisù cháo tā miáotiao ér tǐngbá de shēnzī piēle yì yǎn。

I was lucky, thin as a rail and never hungry.

我很幸运，苗条如杆，也从不饥饿。

He goes to the field, and records the detailed growth of the seedlings every day.
这个苗寨规模非常大，有将近八百户人家。
Zhège miáozhài guīmó fēicháng dà，yǒu jiāngjìn bābǎi hù rénjiā。
This stockaded village of the Miao\'s is huge, and contains nearly 800 families.
种树的时候，一定要先把树苗竖直了再培土。
Zhòngshù de shíhou，yídìng yào xiān bǎ shùmiáo shùzhí le zài péitǔ。
While planting trees, we must first make sure that the sapling is upright, and then add earth.
不要小瞧这些树苗，要不了几年这里就会蔚然成林。
Búyào xiǎoqiáo zhèxiē shùmiáo，yàobùliǎo jǐnián zhèlǐ jiùhuì wèirán chénglín。
Do not look down upon these saplings, they will grow into a forest in a few years.
今年养殖场一次性投放了20万只蟹苗。
Jīnnián yǎngzhíchǎng yícìxìng tóufàng le èrshíwàn zhī xièmiáo。
This year more than 200,000 young crabs were put in the aquatic breeding farms.
定期给瓜苗压压蔓，有利于它的生长。
Dìngqī gěi guāmiáo yāyā màn，yǒulìyú tā de shēngzhǎng。
To put some earth on the stem every certain length regularly will help the melon seedlings to grow.
养殖场刚刚买了一批鸭苗，很可爱的。
Yǎngzhíchǎng gānggāng mǎi le yì pī yāmiáo，hěn kě\'ài de。
Some ducklings have just born in the breeding farm. They are really lovely.
用这种方法教育孩子，简直是拔苗助长。
Yòng zhèzhǒng fāngfǎ jiàoyù háizǐ，jiǎnzhíshì bámiáozhùzhǎng。
Teaching children in this way simply means applying too much pressure and damaging them.

She has a beautiful face and a slender figure.

抛出一项欺骗性的提案
pāochū yí xiàng qīpiànxìng de tí\'àn
dish out (or trot out) a phoney proposal
跑到第三圈，他已经把别人远远地抛在后面了。
Pǎodào dì sān quān，tā yǐjing bǎ biérén yuǎnyuǎn de pāozài hòumiàn le。
On the third lap he left the other runners far behind.
抛进历史的垃圾堆
pāojìn lìshǐ de lājīduī
be relegated to the garbage heap of history
摩擦抛光
mócā pāoguāng
burnishing
抛光剂
pāoɡuānɡjì
polishing compound; polish
抛光轮
pāoɡuānɡlún
polishing wheel; buff

Tóuzīzhě pāokōngwǎngwǎngshì wèi le yínglì。
Investors often sell short for profit.
抛离亲生骨肉
pāolí qīnshēnggǔròu
abandon one\'s own flesh and blood
汽车中途抛锚了。
Qìchē zhōng tú pāomáo le。
The car broke down on the way.
抛弃妻儿
pāoqì qī\'ér
abandon one\'s wife and kids
抛却不切实际的幻想
pāoquè búqièshíjì de huànxiǎng
cast away unrealistic notions (or fanciful ideas)
饭粒抛洒满地。
Fànlì pāosǎ mǎn dì。
Grains of cooked rice were scattered all over the floor.
抛洒一腔热血
pāosǎ yì qiāngrèxuè
shed one\'s blood (for a just cause)

Bàndàor shàng qìchē jìngrán pāomáo le，wǒmen jíhuài le。
The car broke down halfway, we were very anxious.

Yí rù chánmén，nǐ yào pāoquè zìjǐ duìyú chénshì de juànliàn。
You have to discard your yearnings for the profane world once you become a monk.

Tā pāoqì qīzǐ，zhēnshì yígè Chén Shìměi。
He abondoned his wife and children, which really makes him a Chen Shimei.

他真是个狠心狼，抛妻弃子自己出走。

羞辱
xiūrǔ
shame; dishonour; humiliation
当众羞辱人。
受到羞辱。
Being sacked was the final humiliation.
被解雇是莫大的羞辱。
He humiliated his colleague by criticising him in front of the boss.

他在老板面前批评他的同事，因而让同事蒙受羞辱。

Tā bùdébù yícìcì de méngshòu xiūrǔ。
他不得不一次次地蒙受羞辱。

The bride gets off the sedan chair bashfully.
他的谎言被我揭破了，但他却一点也不羞愧。
Tā de huǎngyán bèi wǒ jiēpò le，dàn tā què yìdiǎn yě bùxiūkuì。
I exposed his lies, but he seemed not be ashamed at all.
他总说自己脸薄，但做起事来从来是不知羞耻。
Tā zǒng shuō zìjǐ liǎnbáo，dàn zuòqǐshìlái cónglái shì bùzhī xiūchǐ。
He always says he is thin-skinned, but he always acts without knowing shame.
提出这样的请求，你也太没羞没臊了。
Tíchū zhèyàng de qǐngqiú，nǐ yě tài méixiū méisào le。
Shame on you for making such a demand.
她看中了一件漂亮衣服，可是囊中羞涩，所以没有买。
Tā kànzhòng le yíjiàn piàoliàng yīfu，kěshì náng zhōng xiūsè，suǒyǐ méiyǒu mǎi。
She took a fancy to a beautiful garment, but she didn’t buy it because she couldn’t afford it.
她很想向连长表达爱意却一直羞口。
Tā hěn xiǎng xiàng liáncháng biǎodá àiyì què yìzhí xiūkǒu。
She wanted very much to express her admiration for the company commander, but was always too shy to speak it out.
看到他羞赧的样子，大家都笑了。
Kàndào tā xiūnǎn de yàngzi，dàjiā dōu xiào le。
Seeing his shy looks, we all laughed.
每当人多的时候，她总是一副羞人答答的模样。
Měidāng rén duō de shíhou，tā zǒngshì yífù xiūrén dādā de múyang。
Whenever there is a crowd of people, she always looks bashful.
听了你的话，小王觉得羞躁极了。
Tīng le nǐ de huà，Xiǎo Wáng juédé xiūzào jí le。
What you said made Xiao Wang feel extremely ashamed.
他是个腼腆的人，你就不要再羞躁他了。
Tā shì gè miǎntiǎn de rén，nǐ jiù búyào zài xiūzào tā le。
He is a shy person. Don\'t embarrass him any more.
到底什么事让你羞于启齿？
Dàodǐ shénme shì ràng nǐ xiūyú qǐchǐ？
What on earth is it that makes it difficult for you to open your mouth?
老王说出真相，揭开了小李最后的遮羞布。
Lǎo Wáng shuōchū zhēnxiāng，jiēkāi le Xiǎo Lǐ zuìhòu de zhēxiū。
Old Wang revealed the truth, and took off Xiaoli\'s last fig leaf.
害羞
hàixiū
be shy
他脸皮厚，不知羞耻。
Tā liǎnpí hòu，bùzhī xiūchǐ.
He\'s very thick-skinned and has no sense of shame.
在生人面前，她很怕羞。
Zài shēngrén miànqián，tā hěn pà xiū.
She\'s very shy in front of strangers.
说出真相来羞羞他。
羞惭
顿感羞愧
害羞。
含羞
羞愧。
恼羞成怒
呸！不知羞耻的东西。
没羞没臊
羞涩
识羞。
遮羞。
羞耻。
羞与为伍。
羞愧。
羞得面红耳赤。
怕羞。
羞涩。
遮羞。
羞的两颊潮红，低下了头。
羞得脸发红。
羞得她满脸飞红。
她娇羞地低下了头。
她想倾诉爱慕之情，却又羞口。
羞赧之色。
感到很羞臊。
他是故意羞臊你。
羞于启齿。
这孩子一见生人就害羞。
眉目含羞
含羞一笑。
羞耻之心沦亡殆尽。
没羞没臊
真没羞！
羞得面颊绯红。
不要怕羞，唱两句给大家听听。
羞得她脸上热辣辣的。
羞与为伍。
神情羞惭。
不知羞耻的人。
人总得有羞耻感。
羞答答地不敢抬头。
他羞愤而去。
内心羞愧。
羞愧的目光。
深为羞恼。
羞怯不语。
居然说出这种话，真羞人！
当众羞辱人。
受到羞辱。
羞涩得两颊绯红。
a hangdog expression
羞愧的表情
to hide one\'s head in shame
羞愧得转过脸去
to come out of one\'s shell
不再羞怯(或矜持)
She is very shy compared with her sister.
和姐姐相比，她比较害羞。
People who don\'t know me say that I appear very snobbish, but it\'s just because I\'m shy.
不了解我的人都说我看起来很势利，其实那是因为我害羞。
Don\'t worry, there is nothing to be ashamed of, you\'re not guilty.
别担心，没有什么羞愧的，你没有罪。
Will you ever be ashamed enough of yourself for that?
你会为那件事而感到羞愧万分吗？
Do not be ashamed to say yes when anyone offers to help you.
当有人向你提供帮助时，不用羞于接受。
The next day I felt ashamed that I hadn\'t stopped her from going away alone.
第二天，我感到很羞愧，因为我没有阻止她独自前往。
I\'m proud of my mother, not ashamed of her .
我为我妈妈感到自豪，而不是为她感到羞愧。
She bought such an expensive car that she didn\'t have money for a long time.
她买了一辆价格不菲的汽车，这让她接下来有很长一段时间都囊中羞涩。
Her goal was to shame him into doing a better job next time.
她的目的是让他感到羞愧，这样他下次就能把工作做好点儿。
She was obviously feeling great shame about her behavior last night.
她显然为自己昨天晚上的行为感到很羞愧。
He brought shame into his family when he was arrested last June.
去年6月他被捕了，这让他的家人蒙羞。
The shame that he felt was nothing compared to the legal consequences of his actions.
他的羞耻感不足以弥补这件事所造成的法律后果。
She is a very shy girl.
她是个很害羞的女孩。
My daughter is so shy that conversing with her can be quite difficult for the other kids.
我的女儿非常害羞，别的孩子都很难跟她交谈。
to be ashamed of sb/sth
对某人/某事感到羞愧
Being sacked was the final humiliation.
被解雇是莫大的羞辱。
to hang one\'s head (in shame)
(羞愧得)低下头
it shamed him to admit...
他羞愧地承认…
to shame sb into sth/into doing sth
使某人羞愧地做某事
He was awfully thick-skinned about dumping his girlfriend.
他抛弃了女朋友，真是不知羞耻。
The boy is so unbrave that he never talks in public places.
男孩如此害羞以至于从不在公共场合说话。
All constraints had vanished and the two awkward teenagers on a blind date began to talk.
一阵紧张过后，这两个经别人介绍认识的年轻人羞涩地开始了谈话。
The shy boy demonstrated his love for her by offering a free lunch.
这个羞涩的男孩用请她吃午饭的方式表达了他的爱意。
You have disgraced your family with your mistakes.
Nǐ de guòcuò ràng nǐ de jiārén méngxiū。
你的过错让你的家人蒙羞。
He has no qualms about advertising himself.
Tā duì tuīxiāo xuānchuán zìjǐ de zuòfǎ yìdiǎnr dōu bù gǎndào xiūchǐ。
他对推销宣传自己的做法一点儿都不感到羞耻。
The shame and guilt were weighing heavily upon the crimer.
Xiūkuì hé nèijiù chóngchóng de yāzài fànrén shēnshàng。
羞愧和内疚重重的压在犯人身上。
I remembered the pale, shy little boy.
Wǒ jìdé nàge xūruò de hàixiū de xiǎonánhái。
我记得那个虚弱的害羞的小男孩。
Single parents are a fact of life and should not have to feel ashamed.
Dānqīn jiātíng shì yí gè wúkězhēngbiàn de shìshí，bù xūyào gǎndào xiūkuì。
单亲家庭是一个无可争辩的事实，不需要感到羞愧。
I was a bit shy，like a fly on the wall.
Wǒ yǒudiǎn hàixiū，xiàng yí gè pángguānzhě。
我有点害羞，像一个旁观者。
This mouse was not in the least bit shy，or backward in coming forward.
Zhè zhī lǎoshǔ yìdiǎn yě bú hàixiū，wèisuō。
这只老鼠一点也不害羞，畏缩。
I felt ashamed at what happened.
Wǒ wèi suǒ fāshēng de shìqing gǎndào xiūkuì。
我为所发生的事情感到羞愧。
I was ashamed for the thing we call civilisation.
Wǒ wèi wǒmen suǒwèi de“wénmíng”ér gǎndào xiūkuì。
我为我们所谓的“文明”而感到羞愧。
I have to say I felt a bit ashamed of myself.
Wǒ děi shuō，wǒ yǒudiǎn wèi zìjǐ gǎndào xiūkuì。
我得说，我有点为自己感到羞愧。
That man is blowing his own trumpet unashamedly.
Nà míng nánzǐ zhèng háowúxiūchǐ de zài zìwǒchuīxū。
那名男子正毫无羞耻地在自我吹嘘。
The timid girl flinched every time someone brushed past her.
Měicì yǒurén jīngguò shí pèngdào tā，zhège hàixiū de gūniang dōuhuì xiànghòu suō yíxià。
每次有人经过时碰到她，这个害羞的姑娘都会向后缩一下。
Shame they allowed themselves to be bullied into voting  against their wishes.
Tāmen bèi bī zuòchūle wéibèi yìyuàn de tóupiào，zhēnshì xiūchǐ。
他们被逼做出了违背意愿的投票，真是羞耻。
The newspaper has dragged her name through the mud.
Zhè fèn bàozhǐ shǐ tā méngxiū。
这份报纸使她蒙羞。
The long drawn out war in South Africa did much to discredit imperial adventuring.
Nánfēi liánnián búduàn de zhànshì shǐ dìguó de màoxiǎn jìhuà méngxiū。
南非连年不断的战事使帝国的冒险计划蒙羞。
It is not big to make others feel small.
Ràng biérén méngxiū bú shì jiàn shénme liǎobùqǐ de shì。
让别人蒙羞不是件什么了不起的事。
They were shamed into giving money to the beggars.
Gěi qǐgài qián shǐ tāmen gǎndào xiūchǐ。
给乞丐钱使他们感到羞耻。
Dear editor, shame on you - you should check your facts.
Qīn\'àide biānjí，nǐ yīnggāi gǎndào xiūchǐ，nǐ yīnggāi héduì yíxià shìshí。
亲爱的编辑，你应该感到羞耻，你应该核对一下事实。
Jones was shamed out of the school, as he failed to move up a grade level.
Qióngsī xiūkuì de líkāile xuéxiào，yīnwèi tā wèinéng shēngjí。
琼斯羞愧地离开了学校，因为他未能升级。
A mimosa\'s leaves are sensitive to touch.
Hánxiūcǎo de yèzi duì chùmō hěn mǐngǎn。
含羞草的叶子对触摸很敏感。
One mistake brought shame to all his family.
Yí cì cuòwù ràng tā zhěnggè jiātíng méngxiū。
一次错误让他整个家庭蒙羞。
The shy student lingered in the corner.
Zhè míng hàixiū de xuésheng zài jiǎoluò lǐ páihuái。
这名害羞的学生在角落里徘徊。
Are you ashamed for having lied?
Nǐ sāhuǎng bù gǎnjué xiūchǐ ma？
你撒谎不感觉羞耻吗？
She shamed him into making amends.
Tā shǐ tā chūyú xiūkuì ér zuòchū péicháng。
她使他出于羞愧而做出赔偿。
She bowed her head in shame.
Tā xiūkuì de dīxiàle tóu。
她羞愧地低下了头。
He humiliated his colleague by criticising him in front of the boss.
Tā zài lǎobǎn miànqián pīpíng tā de tóngshì，yīn\'ér ràng tóngshì méngshòu xiūrǔ。
他在老板面前批评他的同事，因而让同事蒙受羞辱。
Quarrels and dissensions ensued among the cast, most of whom hurriedly and shamefacedly handed over their parts to understudies.
Zhēngchǎo hé jiūfēn suízhī zài yǎnyuán men zhōngjiān fāshēngle，tāmen dāngzhōng dàbùfèn dōu jíjímángmáng、búgù xiūchǐ de jiāng tāmen de juésè jiāogěile tìshēn yǎnyuán。
争吵和纠纷随之在演员们中间发生了，他们当中大部分都急急忙忙、不顾羞耻地将他们的角色交给了替身演员。
The student who had betrayed his classmate was dissed by everyone.
Chūmài qí tóngxué de xuésheng shòudàole dàjiā de xiūrǔ。
出卖其同学的学生受到了大家的羞辱。
She pouted and looked at him coyly.
Tā juēzhe zuǐ hàixiū de kànzhe tā。
她撅着嘴害羞地看着他。
They were naked, unshy, and unselfconsciously beautiful.
Tāmen chìluǒ zhe，yìdiǎn yě bú hàixiū，zìrán ér měilì。
她们赤裸着，一点也不害羞，自然而美丽。
I never laughed, being bashful; lowering my head, I looked at the wall.
Wǒ cónglái bú xiào，shēngxìng hàixiū；wǒ dīzhe tóu，dīngzhe qiángbì。
我从来不笑，生性害羞；我低着头，盯着墙壁。
The young man began to sidle near the pretty girl sitting on the log.
Zhège niánqīngrén kāishǐ xiūqiè de cèshēn kàojìn zuòzài dà mùtou shàng de nà wèi piàoliang nǚhái。
这个年轻人开始羞怯地侧身靠近坐在大木头上的那位漂亮女孩。
He had to undergo one humiliation after another.
Tā bùdébù yícìcì de méngshòu xiūrǔ。
他不得不一次次地蒙受羞辱。
Miss Burney protested indignantly, her long thin nose turning pink with mortification at this irreverent piece of mimicry.
Bóní xiǎojiě fènnù de kàngyì，gǎnjué zhè zhǒng bújìng mófǎng duì tā éryán shì yì zhǒng xiūrǔ，tā shòucháng de bízi yīncǐ yě biàn de fā hóng。
伯尼小姐愤怒地抗议，感觉这种不敬模仿对她而言是一种羞辱，她瘦长的鼻子因此也变得发红。
The teacher tried to bring out the shy boy.
Lǎoshī xiǎngyào gǔlì nàge hàixiū de nánhái kāilǎng yìdiǎn。
老师想要鼓励那个害羞的男孩开朗一点。
They wanted to stigmatize the adulteress.
Tāmen dǎsuan xiūrǔ zhè míng jiānfù。
他们打算羞辱这名奸妇。
She tends to put down younger women colleagues.
Tā zǒng ài xiūrǔ niánqīng nǚtóngshì。
她总爱羞辱年轻女同事。
She blushed guiltily as she spoke.
Tā shuōhuà de shíhou liǎnsè xiūhóng。
她说话的时候脸色羞红。
He smiled shyly.
Tā xiūqiè de xiàozhe。
他羞怯地笑着。
He\'s not antisocial; just shy.
Tā bìng bú shì bú shàn jiāojì，jǐnjǐn shì hàixiū éryǐ。
他并不是不善交际，仅仅是害羞而已。
She was refreshingly free from shyness.
Tā búzài hàixiū，jīngshen wéizhīyízhèn。
她不再害羞，精神为之一振。
She was girlishly shy.
Tā xiàng shàonǚbān hàixiū。
她像少女般害羞。
The sensitiveness of mimosa leaves does not depend on a change of growth.
Hánxiūcǎo yèzi de mǐngǎnxìng búhuì yīn shēngzhǎng ér biànhuà。
含羞草叶子的敏感性不会因生长而变化。
The blushing boy was brought before the principal.
Zhège hàixiū de nánhái bèi dàidàole xiàozhǎng miànqián。
这个害羞的男孩被带到了校长面前。
He is kind of shy.
Tā yǒudiǎn hàixiū。
他有点害羞。
他对我撒了谎还不识羞。
Tā duì wǒ sǎ le huǎng hái bùshíxiū。
He feels no shame for having lied to me.
识羞。

我从来不笑，生性害羞；我低着头，盯着墙壁。
The teacher tried to bring out the shy boy.

He\'s not antisocial; just shy.

他并不是不善交际，仅仅是害羞而已。
She was refreshingly free from shyness.

纽约港的水又油又脏，充满了细菌。
There are two dirty glasses in the sink, has somebody been here?
水槽里有两个脏兮兮的玻璃杯，有人来过吗？
The sink is full of washing up，the stove is covered in dirty pans.
Shuǐcáo fàngmǎnle dàixǐ de cānjù，huǒlú shàng fàngzhe zāng pánzi。
水槽放满了待洗的餐具，火炉上放着脏盘子。
他们很懒，宿舍总是脏乱差第一。
Tāmen hěn lǎn，sùshè zǒngshì zāngluànchà dìyī。
They are so lazy that their dorm room is always the dirtiest one.
这个过厅里堆满了杂物，又脏又乱。
Zhège guòtīng lǐ duīmǎn le záwù，yòu zāng yòu luàn。
Filled with odds and ends, the hallway is dirty and in disorder.
治理脏乱差。
脏乱不堪。
屋里又脏又乱，没有下脚之处。
The cleaner just quit, leaving the restaurant a mess.
清洁工辞职不久，餐馆就变得一片脏乱。
The kitchen was unappealingly dirty.
Chúfáng zāngluànbùkān。
厨房脏乱不堪。
What a sodding mess.
Duōme zāngluàn yā。
多么脏乱呀。
what a mess!
真是又脏又乱！
to be a mess

The buildings were in a state of total disrepair.
Zhèxiē lóufáng āngzāng língluàn，pòbàibùkān。
这些楼房肮脏凌乱，破败不堪。
When the cute man was looked at her, her heart gave a nervous flutter.
Dāng nàgè yīngjùn de nánrén dīngzhe tā kàn shí，tā de xīnzàng kāishǐ pēngpēng luàntiào。
当那个英俊的男人盯着她看时，她的心脏开始怦怦乱跳。
Her hair was wild and her clothes were very dirty.
她的头发蓬乱，衣服也脏兮兮的。
Her heart fluttered like the trembling of a captured bird.
Tā de xīnzàng xiàng chuāile zhǐ xiǎoniǎo yíyàng pēngpēng luàntiào。
她的心脏像揣了只小鸟一样怦怦乱跳。
Her own heart was thumping，banging about in her chest like a tennis ball.
Tā de xīnzàng jiùxiàng yì kē wǎngqiú，zài xiōngtáng lǐ pēngpēngluàntiào。
她的心脏就像一颗网球，在胸膛里怦怦乱跳。

mǎnkǒu zānghuà 
pour out dirty words
他用脏话骂人。
Tā yòngzānghuà mà rén。
He shouted obscenities at someone.

Shuōhuà bié dài zāngzì。
Don\'t swear.
与他这种人讲话，我还怕脏污了我的嘴呢。

By speaking to someone like him I shall only be fouling myself.
满口脏话
脏得不像话
说话不带脏字。
说话别带脏字儿。
She said a dirty word at school.
她在学校说脏话了。
I\'ve never talked dirty, and I can\'t seem to be able to do it.
我从不说脏话，好像也说不出口。
Her never used a curse when he spoke to her.
Tā hé tā shuōhuà de shíhou，cónglái bù shuō zānghuà。
他和她说话的时候，从来不说脏话。
I don\'t want to hear that kind of filth again, you hear me?

我不想再听到那种脏话，你听见了吗？

Wǒmen bù yīng róngrěn zānghuà。

She had learned strong language from her stepsons.
Tā cóng tā de jìzǐ nàli xué lái xiē zānghuà。
她从她的继子那里学来些脏话。
I muttered obscenities under my breath.

遗传性心脏病很难治愈。

他的心脏病犯了，快去叫救护车。

Paul had a heart attack and is still on the danger list.

保罗心脏病发作，现在仍然病势危急。
Heart disease is the biggest killer in the United States.
Xīnzàngbìng shì měiguó de dì-yī shāshǒu。
心脏病是美国的第一杀手。
Heart disease can get the best of us.

Some diseases affect both heart and lungs, so sometimes they are transplanted together.

一些疾病同时影响心脏和肺，因此，有时将它们一起移植。
His heart fibrillated and he died.
Tā de xīnzàng yǒu xiānwéixìng chàndòng de jíbìng，hòulái tā qùshì le。

The patient\'s heart had to be defibrillated to save his life.

他心脏病突发，溘逝在自己家里。
Tā xīnzàngbìng tūfā，kèshì zài zìjǐ jiā lǐ。
He passed away at home after a sudden heart attack.
这位产妇患有先天性心脏病，必须剖腹产。
Zhèwèi chǎnfù huànyǒu xiāntiānxìng xīnzàngbìng，bìxū pōufùchǎn。
The pregnant woman has a congenital heart disease, she has to have a Caesarean section.
法医说他死于突发性心脏病。
Fǎyī shuō tā sǐ yú tūfāxìng xīnzàngbìng。
The judicial doctor said that he died of a sudden heart attack.
遗传性心脏病很难治愈。
Yíchuánxìng xīnzàngbìng hěn nán zhìyù。
It is hard to treat genetic heart disease.
老王突发心脏病去世了，他的遗缺至今无人顶替。
Lǎo Wáng tūfā xīnzàngbìng qùshì le，tā de yíquē zhìjīn wúrén dǐngtì。
Lao Wang had a sudden heart attack and died, his vacancy hasn\'t been filled yet.
他的心脏病犯了，快去叫救护车。
Tā de xīnzàngbìng fàn le，kuàiqù jiào jiùhùchē。
He had a heart attack; go call an ambulance!

他心脏病突发后，护士还能否在他身上体察出一丝生命的迹象？

心脏病发作后，他得好一段时间里不能太过操劳了。

她死于心脏病。

在禁烟的国家里可以看到心脏病死亡率大幅度减少。

Guòdù zhīfáng zēngjiāle huàn xīnzàngbìng de fēngxiǎn。
过度脂肪增加了患心脏病的风险。
Two of my uncles died from heart trouble.
Wǒ de liǎng gè shūshu dōu sǐ yú xīnzàngbìng。
我的两个叔叔都死于心脏病。
He did not know that he had developed a fatal heart condition.
Tā bù zhīdào zìjǐ yǐjīng déle zhìmìng de xīnzàngbìng。
他不知道自己已经得了致命的心脏病。
Smoking is linked both to lung cancer and heart disease.
Xīyān yǐnqǐ fèi\'ái hé xīnzàngbìng。
吸烟引起肺癌和心脏病。
His mother lingered on for a few months after her heart attack.

她母亲在得了心脏病后苟延残喘活了几个月。
It often takes something like a heart attack to bring home to people to stop smoking.
Jīngcháng xūyào lèisì xīnzàngbìngfā de shìjiàn cái néng ràng rén míngbai yào tíngzhǐ xīyān。
经常需要类似心脏病发的事件才能让人明白要停止吸烟。
Paul had a heart attack and is still on the danger list.
Bǎoluó xīnzàngbìng fāzuò，xiànzài réngrán bìngshì wēijí。
保罗心脏病发作，现在仍然病势危急。
Heart disease is the biggest killer in the United States.
Xīnzàngbìng shì měiguó de dì-yī shāshǒu。
心脏病是美国的第一杀手。
Heart disease can get the best of us.
Xīnzàngbìng búhuì fàngguò wǒmen měi yí gè rén。
心脏病不会放过我们每一个人。
Some diseases affect both heart and lungs, so sometimes they are transplanted together.
Yìxiē jíbìng tóngshí yǐngxiǎng xīnzàng hé fèi，yīncǐ，yǒushí jiāng tāmen yìqǐ yízhí。
一些疾病同时影响心脏和肺，因此，有时将它们一起移植。
His heart fibrillated and he died.
Tā de xīnzàng yǒu xiānwéixìng chàndòng de jíbìng，hòulái tā qùshì le。
他的心脏有纤维性颤动的疾病，后来他去世了。
The patient\'s heart had to be defibrillated to save his life.
Wèile wǎnjiù bìngrén de shēngmìng，bìxū duì qí xīnzàng jìnxíng qùxiānchàn shǒushù。

唯一能治疗这个病人的方法就是体外循环心脏手术。

The department of cardiac surgery is very experienced in treating congenital heart disease.
心脏内科的医生怎么能不会判读心电图呢？

How can a physician be unable to interpret a electrocardiogram?

昨天她的心脏病又发作了。

She had another heart attack yesterday.

她并不那么健康，心脏有问题，有点杂音。

那沸热的温泉，能够解除人体的疲劳。
Nà fèirè de wēnquán，nénggòu jiěchú réntǐ de píláo。
That near-boiling spring can ease one\'s fatigue.
喷涌而出的温泉水暗示人们：这地下有热能。
Pēnyǒng érchū de wēnquánshuǐ ànshì rénmen：zhè dexià yǒu rènéng。
The gushing hot spring water suggests that there might be heat energy underground.
温泉
wēnquán
hot spring

The temperatue of a cold fountain is determined by underground water temperature.

温泉浴场。
This city has a lot of famous hot springs.
该市有众多著名的温泉。

这个地区周围有几处温泉。

在温泉浴场的一个星期让我恢复了体力。
I like to treat myself to a day at a spa when I am depressed.

Tā xiě qǐ wénzhāng sīrú quányǒng，xíngwén chōngchàng。
His written ideas have both rich content, and smooth style.
他文思如泉涌、笔下能生花。
Tā wénsī rú quányǒng、bǐxià néng shēnghuā。

After thinking for a long time, he was suddenly inspired and wrote smoothly.

There is an old saying in China, &quot;A drop received in need will be repaid with a whole river.&quot;
从小妈妈就教育我，小恩小惠也当涌泉相报。

My mother told me to repay even the smallest favor.
您的大恩大德小弟铭记在心，异日定当涌泉相报。

她颤抖着身体，他觉得像一个熔炉。
The woman\'s head and shoulders were shaking with sobs.
Zhège nǚrén de tóu hé jiānbǎng yīnwèi chuòqì ér chàndǒu。
这个女人的头和肩膀因为啜泣而颤抖。
At the very thought he felt a tendency to tremble.
Yì xiǎngqǐ zhège niàntou，tā jiù gǎnjué yào chàndǒu。
一想起这个念头，他就感觉要颤抖。
He was tingling with pleasure.
Tā yīnwèi gāoxìng ér jīdòng de chàndǒu。
他因为高兴而激动得颤抖。
&quot;I--I\'m going to make you a cup of tea&quot;, she explained shakily.
“Wǒ —— wǒ xiǎng gěi nǐ pàobēichá，”tā shēngyīn chàndǒu de jiěshì dào。
“我——我想给你泡杯茶，”她声音颤抖地解释道。
The leaves rustled tremulously in the wind.
Shùyè zài fēng zhōng chàndǒuzhe，shāshāzuòxiǎng。
树叶在风中颤抖着，沙沙作响。
The man began quaveringly to question the soldier.
Nà rén kāishǐ chàndǒuzhe shēngyīn xúnwèn nàgè shìbīng。
那人开始颤抖着声音询问那个士兵。
His voice wobbled with restrained emotion.
Tā de shēngyīn yóuyú yāyì qíngxù ér chàndǒu。
他的声音由于压抑情绪而颤抖。
Palpitant movements rather than violent eruptions.
Chàndǒu de yídòng ér bú shì měngliè de bàofā。
颤抖的移动而不是猛烈的爆发。
I just felt sorry for that little shaking whitey.
我只是为那颤正在抖的白人难过。
She was so cold her teeth were chattering and her whole body was trembling.
Tā lěng dé yáchǐ dǎzhàn húnshēn fādǒu。

císhàn jīguān 
charitable institution (or organization)
慈善事业
císhàn shìyè 
charities; good works; philanthropy

《Xìwéiliùjuéjù》（Dù Fǔ）：“ěrcáo shēn yǔ míng jùmiè，búfèi jiānghé wàngǔliú”。
In A Playful Quatrain, Du Fu wrote, &quot;Even if your bodies and names should perish, the flowing of the rivers will not stop.
《红楼梦》（曹雪芹）第十七回：“一年三百六十日，风刀霜剑严相逼。”

&quot;I am surrounded by the knives of wind and swords of frost 360 days a year.&quot;--A Dream of the Red Chamber, chapter 17.
典韦是曹操手下的一员悍将。
Diǎn Wěi shì Cáo Cāo shǒuxià de yì yuán hànjiàng。
Dian Wei was a dauntless, and brave military officer under Cao Cao.
脂砚斋评点了曹雪芹的《红楼梦》。

文武官员再三劝进，曹操就是不肯称帝。

Civil and military officials urged Cao Cao to ascend the throne again and again, but he refused every time.
小王是个墨守陈规的人，萧规曹随正是他的行事风格。
Xiǎo Wáng shì gè mòshǒuchénguī de rén，xiāoguīcáosuí zhèngshì tā de xíngshì fēnggé。
Xiao Wang is a conservative person who strictly follows the established rules.
东汉末，曹操延纳天下贤才，雄霸一方。
