他记录了下他生命中的所有小祸小福。
I always encounter good luck and bad luck at the same time.
对我来说，福祸总是双至。
祸从口出
这真是福无双至，祸不单行。
Zhè zhēnshì fúwú shuāngzhì，huòbùdānxíng。
Alas! Happiness comes alone while misfortune loves company.
这可真是福无双至，祸不单行。
Zhè kě zhēnshì fúwú shuāngzhì，huòbùdānxíng。
Blessings do not come in pairs and calamities never come alone.
祸不单行。
祸根不除，大家不得安枕。
Huògēn bùchú，dàjiā bùdé ānzhěn。
We can\'t rest in peace if this evil is not eradicated.
球迷们疯狂地争斗起来，看台倒坍，酿成惨祸。
Qiúmímen fēngkuáng de zhēngdòu qǐlái，kàntái dǎotān，niàngchéngcǎnhuò。
When the football fans got into a frenzied fight, the spectators\' stand collapsed and a horrible disaster occurred.
他惨死于车祸。
Tā cǎnsǐ yú chēhuò。
He died a tragic death in a traffic accident.
昨天出了两起车祸，死伤四人。
Zuótiān chū le liǎng qǐ chēhuò，sǐshāng sì rén。
There were two traffic accidents yesterday, with four casualties.
你闯祸了。
Nǐ chuǎnghuò le。
Look what you\'ve done!
你开车要小心，千万别闯祸。
Nǐ kāi chē yào xiǎoxīn，qiānwàn bié chuǎnghuò。
Drive carefully and be sure not to have an accident.
灾祸从天而降。
Zāihuò cóngtiān\'érjiàng。
A disaster descended from heaven (i.e. befell sb. unexpectedly).
入冬以来，车祸迭起。
Rù dōng yǐlái，chēhuò diéqǐ。
Since winter began, there have been frequent traffic accidents.
飞祸
fēihuò
unexpected disaster
埋下祸根
máixià huògēn 
lay up trouble for the future
一小撮祸国殃民的民族败类
yìxiǎocuō huòguóyāngmín de mínzú bàilèi 
dregs of the nation who wreck the country and ruin the people
黄河在历史上经常引起祸害。
HuángHé zài lìshǐ shàngjīngchángyǐnqǐ huòhài。
Throughout the ages the Yellow River was a scourge of the nation.
防止野猪祸害庄稼。
Fánɡzhǐ yězhū huòhài zhuānɡjiɑ。
Don\'t let the boars damage the crops.
罹祸
líhuò 
suffer misfortune
祸在眉睫
huò zài méijié 
in imminent danger
酿祸
niànɡ huò
lead to disaster
可庆幸的是，这次车祸无人死亡。
Kě qìngxìng de shì，zhècì chēhuò wú rén sǐwáng。
Happily, no one was killed in the car accident.
这都是我惹的祸。
Zhè dōushì wǒ rě de huò。
It was I who started all the trouble.
遭杀身之祸
zāo shāshēn zhī huò
meet with a fatal disaster
战祸复发，生灵涂炭。
Zhànhuò fùfā，shēnglíngtútàn。
War broke out again, plunging the people into misery and suffering.
这次车祸死了五人。
Zhècì chēhuò sǐ le wǔ rén。
The accident took five people\'s lives.
天有不测风云，人有旦夕祸福。
Tiānyǒubúcèfēngyún，rényǒudànxīhuòfú。
Storms gather without warning and bad luck befalls men overnight. or In nature there are unexpected storms and in life unpredictable vicissitudes.
消弭祸患
xiāomǐ huòhuàn
put an end to a disaster
灾祸临头。
Zāihuò lín tóu。
A great disaster is befalling (or imminent).
这孩子老给大人招灾惹祸。
Zhè háizi lǎo gěi dàrén zhāozāirěhuò。
This child is always making trouble for his parents.
惹祸
rěhuò
court disaster; stir up trouble
祸国殃民
huòguóyāngmín
bring calamity to the country and the people
幸灾乐祸
xìngzāilèhuò
take pleasure in (or gloat over) other people\'s misfortune
他面露微笑，却包藏祸心。
Tā miànlòu wēixiào，què bāocáng huòxīn。
Though he is all smiles on the outside, on the inside, he has an evil mind.
这起车祸的肇事车本主儿已驾车逃跑。
Zhè qǐ chēhuò de zhàoshìchē běnzhǔr yǐ jiàchē táopǎo。
The person who caused this accident drove away in their car.
兵祸四起，老百姓的日子更苦了。
Bīnghuò sìqǐ，lǎobǎixìng de rìzi gèng kǔ le。
The turmoil caused by war made people’s life even more miserable.
这次车祸使得车体完全被损坏了。
Zhècì chēhuò shǐdé chētǐ wánquán bèi sǔnhuài le。
The car\'s body was completely destroyed after the accident.
自从那次车祸后，他的腿就再也不吃劲了。
Zìcóng nà cì chēhuò hòu，tā de tuǐ jiù zài yě bùchījìn le。
After the traffic accident, his legs can\'t bear much weight.
尺蚓穿堤并非危言耸听，不注意细节也会酿大祸。
Chǐyǐn chuāndī bìngfēi wēiyánsǒngtīng，búzhùyì xìjié yě huì niàngdàhuò。
It is not alarmism to refer to the old saying &quot;that a little fish worm can damage a dyke&quot;.  Neglect of details may lead to catastrophe.
车祸现场疮痍满目一片狼藉。
Chēhuò xiànchǎng chuāngyí mǎnmù yípiàn lángjí。
Everywhere near the scene of the car accident,  destruction meets the eye.
他性格粗莽，经常给家里惹祸。
Tā xìnggé cūmǎng，jīngcháng gěi jiā lǐ rěhuò。
He is boorish and rash, so he always brings trouble to his family.
这真是福无双至，祸不单行。
Zhè zhēnshì fúwú shuāngzhì，huòbùdānxíng。
Alas! Happiness comes alone while misfortune loves company.
天有不测风云，人有旦夕祸福。
Tiānyǒubúcèfēngyún，rényǒudànxīhuòfú。
In nature there are unexpected storms, and life has unpredictable vicissitudes.
车祸就发生在眼前，我吓得都快掉魂儿了。
Chēhuò jiù fāshēng zài yǎnqián，wǒ xià de dōu kuài diàohúnr le。
The car accident happened right in front of my eyes. I was scared out of my wits.
他认为人生祸福早有定数。
Tā rènwéi rénshēng huòfú zǎo yǒu dìngshù。
He believes that everybody\'s life is predestined.
如果不是这场飞祸，他们两个早就结婚了。
Rúguǒ búshì zhèchǎng fēihuò，tāmen liǎnggè zǎo jiù jiéhūn le。
They would have got married if the accident hadn\'t occurred.
他被楼上掉下的花盆砸伤了头部，这真是飞来横祸啊！
Tā bèi lóu shàng diào xià de huāpén zá shāng le tóubù，zhè zhēnshi fēilái hénghuò a！
He was hit by a flowerpot which fell from upstairs, what an unexpected disaster!
他家发生了火灾，这真是飞灾横祸啊。
Tā jiā fāshēng le huǒzāi，zhè zhēnshi fēizāi hénghuò a。
A fire broke out in his house, a really unexpected disaster.
车祸中，这只可怜的小狗死于非命。
Chēhuò zhōng，zhèzhī kělián de xiǎogǒu sǐyú fēimìng。
This poor little puppy died in a traffic accident.
解放前夕，这里的山区匪祸连连。
Jiěfàng qiánxī，zhèlǐ de shānqū fěihuò liánlián。
Before 1945, banditry was rampant in the mountain areas of this place.
车祸肇事者竟然驾车逃走，目击群众愤愤不平。
Chēhuò zhàoshìzhě jìngrán jiàchē táozǒu，mùjī qúnzhòng fènfèn bùpíng。
The person who caused the car accident ran away, which aroused strong indignation among the witnesses.
发生车祸后，肇事车辆竟然逃离现场，目击者无不愤激。
Fāshēng chēhuò hòu，zhàoshì chēliàng jìngrán táolí xiànchǎng，mùjīzhě wúbú fènjī。
The person who caused the car accident ran away, which aroused strong indignation among the witnesses.
这可真是福无双至，祸不单行。
Zhè kě zhēnshì fúwú shuāngzhì，huòbùdānxíng。
Blessings do not come in pairs and calamities never come alone.
尉迟恭将军因性情刚直招祸，被贬为平民挂甲回家。
WèiChígōng jiāngjūn yīn xìngqíng gāngzhí zhāohuò，bèi biǎnwéi píngmín guàjiǎ huíjiā。
General Weichigong\'s upright and outspoken character brought him big trouble. He was demoted to a civilian and send back home.
这条害河必须治理，否则就会祸害沿岸的居民。
Zhè tiáo hàihé bìxū zhìlǐ，fǒuzé jiùhuì huòhài yánàn de jūmín。
This harmful river must be harnessed, or it will be detrimental to the inhabitants along the river.
他天生火性，出去很容易闯祸。
Tā tiānshēng huǒxìng,chūqù hĕn róngyì chuǎnghuò.
He was born with a short temper, it\'s prone to cause troubles in society.
任何时候祸福都是并存的，我们要放平心态去接受。
Rènhé shíhou huòfú dōushì bìngcún de，wǒmen yào fàngpíng xīntài qù jiēshòu。
Disasters and happiness always go together. We should accept them calmly.
每次战争都会祸及无辜，所以一定要维护和平。
Měi cì zhànzhēng dōuhuì huòjí wúgū，suǒyǐ yídìng yào wéihù hépíng。
Every war hurts innocent people, so we must preserve peace.
这次祸乱持续了很久，对人力物力都有很大的损失。
Zhècì huòluàn chíxù le hěnjiǔ，duì rénlì wùlì dōu yǒu hěndà de sǔnshī。
This scourge has lasted for quite a long time. Both sides have lost a lot of people and property.
他只是一时走背运，却被这个算卦的人告知是有鬼神祸祟。
Tā zhǐshì yìshí zǒu bèiyùn，què bèi zhège suànguà de rén gàozhī shì yǒu guǐshén huòsuì。
He was just unlucky for a while, but the fortune-teller said that there was some ghost haunting him.
谁也不会想到他会遭此祸殃，变成了瘫痪。
Shéi yě búhuì xiǎngdào tā huì zāo cǐ huòyāng，biànchéng le tānhuàn。
No one had thought that he would meet such a disaster and become paralyzed.
在火药库附近没有及时熄灭烟火，就留下了祸种，随时会引起火灾。
Zài huǒyàokù fùjìn méiyǒu jíshí xīmiè yānhuǒ，jiù liúxià le huòzhǒng，suíshí huì yǐnqǐ huǒzāi。
Those unextinguished butts near the powder magazine could cause a fire at any time.
司机机灵地打了个急转弯才避免了一场车祸。
Sījī jīlíng de dǎ le gè jízhuǎnwān cái bìmiǎn le yìcháng chēhuò。
The driver smartly took a sharp turn, thus avoided an accident.
听到儿子出车祸的消息，他疾步向医院奔去。
Tīngdào érzi chū chēhuò de xiāoxi，tā jíbù xiàng yīyuàn bēnqù。
He ran to the hospital rapidly on hearing the news of his son\'s car accident.
明明是他自己犯的错，他却要嫁祸给别人。
Míngmíng shì tā zìjǐ fàn de cuò，tā què yào jiàhuò gěi biérén。
It\'s obviously his fault, but he puts the blame on somebody else.
这股顽匪已被劫灭净尽，再不能祸害百姓了。
Zhè gǔ wánfěi yǐ bèi jiémiè jìngjìn，zài bùnéng huòhài bǎixìng le。
The ganstershave been eliminated and can no longer harm the people.
在古代礼数是十分森严的，稍有僭越就会有杀身之祸。
Zài gǔdài lǐshù shì shífēn sēnyán de，shāoyǒu jiànyuè jiùhuì yǒu shāshēn zhī huò。
In ancient societies, courtesy between different classes is very strict. Ignoring them, you may bring yourself the disaster of being killed.
往日的一张利嘴今天却给他惹了大祸。
Wǎngrì de yìzhāng lìzuǐ jīntiān què gěi tā rě le dàhuò。
Today his usually gib tongue has brought him catastrophe.
他听说儿子出了车祸后，脸孔刹时没了血色。
Tā tīngshuō érzi chū le chēhuò hòu，liǎnkǒng chàshí méi le xuèsè。
Hearing his son had a car accident, his face lost all color at once.
他在家中贴上了灵符，希望可以避除灾祸。
Tā zài jiā zhōng tiēshàng le língfú，xīwàng kěyǐ bìchú zāihuò。
He affixed spiritual magic figures in his home in hope of warding off disasters.
车祸事故现场有一地血迹和脑浆子，真是恶心。
Chēhuò shìgù xiànchǎng yǒu yídì xuèjì hé nǎojiāngzi，zhēnshì ěxīn。
The scene of the traffic accident is covered with blood and brains, which is extremely disgusting.
青猺曾被怀疑是非典的祸首。
Qīngyáo céng bèi huáiyí shì fēidiǎn de huòshǒu。
The masked civet was suspected of being the chief culprit of SARS.
他在这次车祸中筛骨骨折。
Tā zài zhècì chēhuò zhōng shāigǔ gǔzhé。
His ethmoid bone was broken in the accident.
在车祸现场，医务人员正在对伤者紧急施救。
Zài chēhuò xiànchǎng，yīwù rényuán zhèngzài duì shāngzhě jǐnjí shījiù。
Medical workers are urgently rescuing the injured right at the site of the accident.
你现在收手还为时不晚，如果执迷不悟就会酿成大祸。
Nǐ xiànzài shōushǒu hái wéishí bùwǎn，rúguǒ zhímí búwù jiùhuì niàngchéng dàhuò。
It\'s still not too late if you stop now, there will be serious consequences if you keep to your errors.
这些车祸中的死人正在等待家属的认领。
Zhèxiē chēhuò zhōng de sǐrén zhèngzài děngdài jiāshǔ de rènlǐng。
The dead bodies from these car accidents are waiting to be identified.
他的命真苦，遭遇了这样的天灾人祸。
Tā de mìng zhēn kǔ，zāoyù le zhèyàng de tiānzāi rénhuò。
He\'s got a bad lot, to be struck by such calamities.
他通家死于那场车祸之中。
Tā tōngjiā sǐ yú nà chǎng chēhuò zhī zhōng。
His whole family died in that car accident.
我的头部在这次车祸中被撞伤了。
Wǒ de tóubùzài zhècì chēhuò zhōng bèi zhuàngshāng le。
My head was hurt in the car accident.
您的车祸是在脱保后发生的，所以我们没法对您进行理赔。
Nín de chēhuò shì zài tuōbǎo hòu fāshēng de，suǒyǐ wǒmen méifǎ duì nín jìnxíng lǐpéi。
Your accident happened after your insurance had expired, so we can\'t give you any compensation.
突然遭此横祸，他非得脱皮不可。
Tūrán zāo cǐ hénghuò，tā fēi děi tuōpí bùkě。
Suddenly encountering such a terrible misfortune, he must have been seriously hurt.
这场车祸伤了他的尾椎，每逢阴天下雨尾椎都会酸疼。
Zhèchǎng chēhuò shāng le tā de wěizhuī，měiféng yīntiān xiàyǔ wěizhuī dōuhuì suānténg。
This car accident hurt his coccygeal vertebra, so it aches every rainy day.
一场车祸使他五中俱伤，足足休养了半年才痊愈。
Yìcháng chēhuò shǐ tā wǔ zhōng jùshāng，zúzú xiūyǎng le bànnián cái quányù。
He injured his viscera in a car accident, and it took him half a year to recover.
在车祸中失去心爱的儿子，她心如刀绞，无比痛苦。
Zài chēhuò zhōng shīqù xīnài de érzi，tā xīnrú dāojiǎo，wúbǐ tòngkǔ。
Her heart was torn by the death of her son in a traffic accident.
他在车祸中心窝处受了重创。
Tā zài chēhuò zhōng xīnwōchù shòu le zhòngchuāng。
He was badly injured in his heart in a traffic accident.
路上发生了车祸，行者纷纷驻足观看。
Lù shàng fāshēng le chēhuò，xíngzhě fēnfēn zhùzú guānkàn。
A road accident had happened. Pedestrians all stopped to watch the scene.
今年遭天灾又遇人祸，真是一个凶年。
Jīnnián zāo tiānzāi yòu yù rénhuò，zhēnshì yígè xiōngnián。
There have been natural and man-made calamities this year. It is really a bad year.
鸦片祸国殃民，贻患无穷，我们反对吸食鸦片。
Yāpiàn huòguó yāngmín，yíhuàn wúqióng，wǒmen fǎnduì xīshí yāpiàn。
Opium causes grave harm to the state and the people, leading to endless troubles, so we should object to the use of opium.
原来她丈夫遇车祸去世了，难怪她的哭声这么阴惨。
Yuánlái tā zhàngfū yù chēhuò qùshì le，nánguài tā de kūshēng zhème yīncǎn。
As it turns out that her husband died in a traffic accident, there is no wonder that her crying is so sorrowful and plaintive.
为了躲避战祸，王员外一家决定隐逸山林。
Wèile duǒbì zhànhuò，Wáng yuánwài yìjiā juédìng yǐnyì shānlín。
In order to avoid war, Councillor Wang and his family decided to withdraw from society and live in a mountain forest.
他是由于看见了凶手才招祸的。
Tā shì yóuyú kànjiàn le xiōngshǒu cái zhāohuò de。
He brought trouble because he saw the murderer.
那场车祸使他变成了植物人。
Nà chǎng chēhuò shǐ tā biànchéng le zhíwùrén。
He became a vegetable because of that accident.
这条高速公路因为昨天的那场车祸被阻绝了。
Zhè tiáo gāosù gōnglù yīnwèi zuótiān de nà chǎng chēhuò bèi zǔjué le。
The expressway is blocked from yesterday\'s accident.
经过专家研究，非典的罪魁祸首可能是果子狸。
Jīngguò zhuānjiā yánjiū，fēidiǎn de zuìkuí huòshǒu kěnéng shì guǒzǐlí。
Research by specialists leads people to think the chief culprit for SARS might be masked civet.
车祸使她成了残废。
Chēhuò shǐ tā chéngle cánfèi。
The car accident left her disabled.
闯祸
chuǎnghuò
cause trouble
都是他才酿成了车祸。
Dōushì tā cái niàngchéngle chēhuò。
The car crash was all his fault.
发生了一起车祸。
Fāshēngle yìqǐ chēhuò。
There was a car accident.
车祸妨碍了交通。
Chēhuò fáng\'àile jiāotōng。
The car accident obstructed the traffic.
飞祸
fēihuò
unexpected disaster
因车祸，路被封了。
Yīn chēhuò，lù bèifēngle。
The road was sealed off because of the car accident.
祸根
huògēn
the root of the problem
灾祸的根底
zāihuòde gēndǐ
the cause of the tragic accident
好奇有时会引致灾祸。
Hàoqí yǒushí huì yǐnzhì zāihuò。
Curiosity can sometimes lead to disaster.
这是你自己的错，怎么能嫁祸于人？
Zhè shì nǐ zìjǐ de cuò，zěnmenéng jiàhuòyúrén?
It\'s your fault. How can you shift the blame onto someone else?
幸灾乐祸
xìngzāilèhuò
take pleasure in the misfortunes of others
罹祸
líhuò
suffer misfortune
车祸后，那辆车已经面目全非。
Chēhuò hòu，nà liàng chē yǐjīng miànmùquánfēi.
After the accident, the car was totally unrecognizable.
酒后驾车会酿成大祸。
Jiǔhòujiàchē huì niàngchéngdàhuò.
Drink-driving can lead to disaster.
他的车祸索赔要求迟迟未能得到保险公司的明确答复。
Tā de chēhuò suǒpéi yāoqiú chíchí wèinéng dédào bǎoxiǎngōngsī de míngquè dáfù。
His claim for damages after the car accident has still not been properly dealt with by the insurance company after all this time.
天有不测风云，人有旦夕祸福。
Tiānyǒubúcèfēngyún，rényǒudànxīhuòfú。
Life is as unpredictable as the weather.
车祸后很久他才醒过来。
Chēhuò hòu hěnjiǔ tā cái xǐngguòlái。
After the car crash it took him a long time to come to.
看到他家破人亡，她却幸灾乐祸地笑了。
Kàndào tā jiāpò-rénwáng，tā què xìngzāilèhuò de xiàole。
When she saw that his family was ruined, she gloated at his misfortune.
出车祸的那天早晨，他就有一种不祥的预兆。
Chūchēhuò de nàtiān zǎochén，tā jiù yǒu yìzhǒng bùxiáng de yùzhào。
The morning before the car accident, he had a premonition of disaster.

a misfortune that can\'t be helped
不可避免的灾祸
Somebody called me from the hospital saying that Carl had a car accident two hours ago.
有人从医院给我打电话，说卡尔两个小时前出了车祸。
I had an accident at that bend just one year ago.
就在一年前我在那个转弯处出了车祸。
He went to the dentist for five days straight after his car accident.
车祸之后他连续去看了五天的牙医。
He has been in constant pain since the accident.
车祸后他一直感到疼痛。
The company wants to pocket the money that a badly disabled father got for medical care after an accident.
一位在车祸中严重致残的父亲急需这笔医疗救治的钱，但是公司却想要挪用。
My friends gave me a lot of support after the car accident.
车祸发生以后，朋友们给了我很大的支持。
The crash took place at the same time as he left.
就在他离开时，车祸发生了。
She is a problem for all her family.
她是全家人的祸害。
Corruption is the real disease of Mexico City.
腐败才是墨西哥城里真正的祸害。
A terrible car accident happened yesterday.
昨天发生了一起严重的车祸。
They only suffered cuts and bruises in the car accident.
他们在车祸中只是被划伤了，留下几块淤青。
Police said she died from injuries suffered in the accident.
警察说她因车祸受伤致死。
he was killed in a car crash
他在一场车祸中丧生
it was a blessing in disguise
因祸得福
to end in tragedy/disaster
以悲剧/大祸收尾
to gloat over {or} about sth
对某事幸灾乐祸
to be heading {or} headed for disaster
快要碰到灾祸
Her mother was killed in a car crash.
她母亲死于车祸。
Peter\'s absence of mind during driving nearly caused an accident.
彼得开车时心不在焉，差点出车祸。
I always encounter good luck and bad luck at the same time.
对我来说，福祸总是双至。
He had an accident, and couldn\'t feature in the new film.
他出了车祸，不能出演这部新电影了。
The master architect of disaster was our neighbor country.
这场灾难的罪魁祸首是我们的邻国。
The car accident had significant effect on his ability to run.
这次车祸对他的奔跑能力有很大的影响。
I darted over the scene of the car accident.
Wǒ fēibēn líkāile chēhuò xiànchǎng。
我飞奔离开了车祸现场。
We human beings ourselves have become a threat to our planet.
Wǒmen rénlèi zìshēn yǐjīng chéngwéi wēixié wǒmen suǒ jūzhù xīngqiú de huògēn。
我们人类自身已经成为威胁我们所居住星球的祸根。
He was in great torment after losing all of his children in a car accident.
Tā de háizǐmen quándōu zài chēhuò zhōng sàngshēng，zhè shǐ tā xiànrùle tòngkǔ de shēnyuān。
他的孩子们全都在车祸中丧生，这使他陷入了痛苦的深渊。
A rise in interest rates would be disastrous for millions.
Lìlǜ de zēngzhǎng duì shù bǎiwàn rén láishuō shì dàhuòlíntóu。
利率的增长对数百万人来说是大祸临头。
He saw a car crash then catch fire outside his house.
Tā kàndào tājiā ménwài fāshēngle yì qǐ chēhuò，suíhòu chēliàng qǐle huǒ。
他看到他家门外发生了一起车祸，随后车辆起了火。
We have got the scourge of inflation under control.
Wǒmen yǐ jiāng zhè cì tōnghuòpéngzhàng de huòhuàn kòngzhì zhù le。
我们已将这次通货膨胀的祸患控制住了。
He tried to help those who are under the curse of drug addiction.
Tā shìtú bāngzhù nàxiē shòu dúyǐn huòhài de rén。
他试图帮助那些受毒瘾祸害的人。
Five passengers were killed in a collision involving a bus.
Wǔmíng chéngkè zài yí cì gōngchē chēhuò zhōng sàngshēng。
五名乘客在一次公车车祸中丧生。
Many species will be dwarfed due to this mishap.
Xǔduō wùzhǒng dōu yīn zhè yī zāihuò ér fāyùbùliáng。
许多物种都因这一灾祸而发育不良。
He could sometimes be a bull in a china shop.
Tā yǒushíhòu shì gè bènshǒubènjiǎo dòngzhé chuǎnghuò de rén。
他有时候是个笨手笨脚动辄闯祸的人。
Only three people came through this car accident.
Zhǐyǒu sān gè rén zài zhè chǎng chēhuò zhōng xìngcún xiàlái。
只有三个人在这场车祸中幸存下来。
He has been paralyzed ever since the car accident.
Zìcóng chēhuò yǐhòu tā jiù tānhuàn le。
自从车祸以后他就瘫痪了。
He put his shoulder out of joint in the car accident.
Tā zài chēhuò zhōng，jiānbǎng tuōjiù le。
他在车祸中，肩膀脱臼了。
The police often put out such red herrings to scare the culprit into panicking.
Jǐngchá zǒngshì gěichū zhè zhǒng zhuǎnyí zhùyìlì de dōngxi，ràng zuìkuí-huòshǒu jīnghuáng kǒngjù。
警察总是给出这种转移注意力的东西，让罪魁祸首惊惶恐惧。
She walked away from the car accident without a scratch on her.
Tā cóng zhè chǎng chēhuò zhōng ānrán tuōshēn，yìdiǎn cāshāng yě méiyǒu。
她从这场车祸中安然脱身，一点擦伤也没有。
Spending on education is a positive good, not a necessary evil.
Jiāoyù shàng de huāfèi shì jījí de hǎoshì，búshì bìrán de huòhài。
教育上的花费是积极的好事，不是必然的祸害。
Three passengers were killed in the collision.
Sān míng chéngkè zài chēhuò zhōng sàngshēng。
三名乘客在车祸中丧生。
Termites were responsible for the damage.
Báiyǐ shì zhè yì sǔnhuài de zuìkuíhuòshǒu。
白蚁是这一损坏的罪魁祸首。
He recorded all the little haps and mishaps of his life.
Tā jìlùle xià tā shēngmìng zhōng de suǒyǒu xiǎo huò xiǎo fú。
他记录了下他生命中的所有小祸小福。
It was supererogatory of her to gloat.
Tā méi bìyào xìngzāi-lèhuò。
她没必要幸灾乐祸。
Brazilians know oil can be a curse as well as a blessing.
Bāxī rén zhīdào shíyóu kěyǐ shì huògēn，yě kěyǐ shì ēncì。
巴西人知道石油可以是祸根，也可以是恩赐。
黄河在历史上经常引起祸害。
HuángHé zài lìshǐ shàngjīngchángyǐnqǐ huòhài。
Throughout the ages the Yellow River was a scourge of the nation.
他被楼上掉下的花盆砸伤了头部，这真是飞来横祸啊！
Tā bèi lóu shàng diào xià de huāpén zá shāng le tóubù，zhè zhēnshi fēilái hénghuò a！
He was hit by a flowerpot which fell from upstairs, what an unexpected disaster!
他家发生了火灾，这真是飞灾横祸啊。
Tā jiā fāshēng le huǒzāi，zhè zhēnshi fēizāi hénghuò a。
A fire broke out in his house, a really unexpected disaster.
突然遭此横祸，他非得脱皮不可。
Tūrán zāo cǐ hénghuò，tā fēi děi tuōpí bùkě。
Suddenly encountering such a terrible misfortune, he must have been seriously hurt.

尺蚓穿堤并非危言耸听，不注意细节也会酿大祸。
Chǐyǐn chuāndī bìngfēi wēiyánsǒngtīng，búzhùyì xìjié yě huì niàngdàhuò。
It is not alarmism to refer to the old saying &quot;that a little fish worm can damage a dyke&quot;.  Neglect of details may lead to catastrophe.
往日的一张利嘴今天却给他惹了大祸。
Wǎngrì de yìzhāng lìzuǐ jīntiān què gěi tā rě le dàhuò。
Today his usually gib tongue has brought him catastrophe.
你现在收手还为时不晚，如果执迷不悟就会酿成大祸。
Nǐ xiànzài shōushǒu hái wéishí bùwǎn，rúguǒ zhímí búwù jiùhuì niàngchéng dàhuò。
It\'s still not too late if you stop now, there will be serious consequences if you keep to your errors.
酒后驾车会酿成大祸。
Jiǔhòujiàchē huì niàngchéngdàhuò.
Drink-driving can lead to disaster.
这孩子老给大人招灾惹祸。
Zhè háizi lǎo gěi dàrén zhāozāirěhuò。
This child is always making trouble for his parents.
祸根不除，大家不得安枕。
Huògēn bùchú，dàjiā bùdé ānzhěn。
We can\'t rest in peace if this evil is not eradicated.
这次祸乱持续了很久，对人力物力都有很大的损失。
Zhècì huòluàn chíxù le hěnjiǔ，duì rénlì wùlì dōu yǒu hěndà de sǔnshī。
This scourge has lasted for quite a long time. Both sides have lost a lot of people and property.

to end in tragedy/disaster
以悲剧/大祸收尾
A rise in interest rates would be disastrous for millions.
Lìlǜ de zēngzhǎng duì shù bǎiwàn rén láishuō shì dàhuòlíntóu。
利率的增长对数百万人来说是大祸临头。
The car accident had significant effect on his ability to run.
这次车祸对他的奔跑能力有很大的影响。
My friends gave me a lot of support after the car accident.
车祸发生以后，朋友们给了我很大的支持。
这次车祸使得车体完全被损坏了。
Zhècì chēhuò shǐdé chētǐ wánquán bèi sǔnhuài le。
The car\'s body was completely destroyed after the accident.
这起车祸的肇事车本主儿已驾车逃跑。
Zhè qǐ chēhuò de zhàoshìchē běnzhǔr yǐ jiàchē táopǎo。
The person who caused this accident drove away in their car.
发生车祸后，肇事车辆竟然逃离现场，目击者无不愤激。
Fāshēng chēhuò hòu，zhàoshì chēliàng jìngrán táolí xiànchǎng，mùjīzhě wúbú fènjī。
The person who caused the car accident ran away, which aroused strong indignation among the witnesses.
车祸后，那辆车已经面目全非。
Chēhuò hòu，nà liàng chē yǐjīng miànmùquánfēi.
After the accident, the car was totally unrecognizable.
车祸肇事者竟然驾车逃走，目击群众愤愤不平。
Chēhuò zhàoshìzhě jìngrán jiàchē táozǒu，mùjī qúnzhòng fènfèn bùpíng。
The person who caused the car accident ran away, which aroused strong indignation among the witnesses.
他惨死于车祸。
Tā cǎnsǐ yú chēhuò。
He died a tragic death in a traffic accident.
昨天出了两起车祸，死伤四人。
Zuótiān chū le liǎng qǐ chēhuò，sǐshāng sì rén。
There were two traffic accidents yesterday, with four casualties.
入冬以来，车祸迭起。
Rù dōng yǐlái，chēhuò diéqǐ。
Since winter began, there have been frequent traffic accidents.
可庆幸的是，这次车祸无人死亡。
Kě qìngxìng de shì，zhècì chēhuò wú rén sǐwáng。
Happily, no one was killed in the car accident.
这次车祸死了五人。
Zhècì chēhuò sǐ le wǔ rén。
The accident took five people\'s lives.
自从那次车祸后，他的腿就再也不吃劲了。
Zìcóng nà cì chēhuò hòu，tā de tuǐ jiù zài yě bùchījìn le。
After the traffic accident, his legs can\'t bear much weight.
车祸现场疮痍满目一片狼藉。
Chēhuò xiànchǎng chuāngyí mǎnmù yípiàn lángjí。
Everywhere near the scene of the car accident,  destruction meets the eye.
车祸就发生在眼前，我吓得都快掉魂儿了。
Chēhuò jiù fāshēng zài yǎnqián，wǒ xià de dōu kuài diàohúnr le。
The car accident happened right in front of my eyes. I was scared out of my wits.
车祸中，这只可怜的小狗死于非命。
Chēhuò zhōng，zhèzhī kělián de xiǎogǒu sǐyú fēimìng。
This poor little puppy died in a traffic accident.
司机机灵地打了个急转弯才避免了一场车祸。
Sījī jīlíng de dǎ le gè jízhuǎnwān cái bìmiǎn le yìcháng chēhuò。
The driver smartly took a sharp turn, thus avoided an accident.
听到儿子出车祸的消息，他疾步向医院奔去。
Tīngdào érzi chū chēhuò de xiāoxi，tā jíbù xiàng yīyuàn bēnqù。
He ran to the hospital rapidly on hearing the news of his son\'s car accident.
他听说儿子出了车祸后，脸孔刹时没了血色。
Tā tīngshuō érzi chū le chēhuò hòu，liǎnkǒng chàshí méi le xuèsè。
Hearing his son had a car accident, his face lost all color at once.
车祸事故现场有一地血迹和脑浆子，真是恶心。
Chēhuò shìgù xiànchǎng yǒu yídì xuèjì hé nǎojiāngzi，zhēnshì ěxīn。
The scene of the traffic accident is covered with blood and brains, which is extremely disgusting.
他在这次车祸中筛骨骨折。
Tā zài zhècì chēhuò zhōng shāigǔ gǔzhé。
His ethmoid bone was broken in the accident.
在车祸现场，医务人员正在对伤者紧急施救。
Zài chēhuò xiànchǎng，yīwù rényuán zhèngzài duì shāngzhě jǐnjí shījiù。
Medical workers are urgently rescuing the injured right at the site of the accident.
这些车祸中的死人正在等待家属的认领。
Zhèxiē chēhuò zhōng de sǐrén zhèngzài děngdài jiāshǔ de rènlǐng。
The dead bodies from these car accidents are waiting to be identified.
他通家死于那场车祸之中。
Tā tōngjiā sǐ yú nà chǎng chēhuò zhī zhōng。
His whole family died in that car accident.
我的头部在这次车祸中被撞伤了。
Wǒ de tóubùzài zhècì chēhuò zhōng bèi zhuàngshāng le。
My head was hurt in the car accident.
您的车祸是在脱保后发生的，所以我们没法对您进行理赔。
Nín de chēhuò shì zài tuōbǎo hòu fāshēng de，suǒyǐ wǒmen méifǎ duì nín jìnxíng lǐpéi。
Your accident happened after your insurance had expired, so we can\'t give you any compensation.
这场车祸伤了他的尾椎，每逢阴天下雨尾椎都会酸疼。
Zhèchǎng chēhuò shāng le tā de wěizhuī，měiféng yīntiān xiàyǔ wěizhuī dōuhuì suānténg。
This car accident hurt his coccygeal vertebra, so it aches every rainy day.
一场车祸使他五中俱伤，足足休养了半年才痊愈。
Yìcháng chēhuò shǐ tā wǔ zhōng jùshāng，zúzú xiūyǎng le bànnián cái quányù。
He injured his viscera in a car accident, and it took him half a year to recover.
在车祸中失去心爱的儿子，她心如刀绞，无比痛苦。
Zài chēhuò zhōng shīqù xīnài de érzi，tā xīnrú dāojiǎo，wúbǐ tòngkǔ。
Her heart was torn by the death of her son in a traffic accident.
他在车祸中心窝处受了重创。
Tā zài chēhuò zhōng xīnwōchù shòu le zhòngchuāng。
He was badly injured in his heart in a traffic accident.
路上发生了车祸，行者纷纷驻足观看。
Lù shàng fāshēng le chēhuò，xíngzhě fēnfēn zhùzú guānkàn。
A road accident had happened. Pedestrians all stopped to watch the scene.
原来她丈夫遇车祸去世了，难怪她的哭声这么阴惨。
Yuánlái tā zhàngfū yù chēhuò qùshì le，nánguài tā de kūshēng zhème yīncǎn。
As it turns out that her husband died in a traffic accident, there is no wonder that her crying is so sorrowful and plaintive.
那场车祸使他变成了植物人。
Nà chǎng chēhuò shǐ tā biànchéng le zhíwùrén。
He became a vegetable because of that accident.
这条高速公路因为昨天的那场车祸被阻绝了。
Zhè tiáo gāosù gōnglù yīnwèi zuótiān de nà chǎng chēhuò bèi zǔjué le。
The expressway is blocked from yesterday\'s accident.
车祸使她成了残废。
Chēhuò shǐ tā chéngle cánfèi。
The car accident left her disabled.
都是他才酿成了车祸。
Dōushì tā cái niàngchéngle chēhuò。
The car crash was all his fault.
发生了一起车祸。
Fāshēngle yìqǐ chēhuò。
There was a car accident.
车祸妨碍了交通。
Chēhuò fáng\'àile jiāotōng。
The car accident obstructed the traffic.
因车祸，路被封了。
Yīn chēhuò，lù bèifēngle。
The road was sealed off because of the car accident.
他的车祸索赔要求迟迟未能得到保险公司的明确答复。
Tā de chēhuò suǒpéi yāoqiú chíchí wèinéng dédào bǎoxiǎngōngsī de míngquè dáfù。
His claim for damages after the car accident has still not been properly dealt with by the insurance company after all this time.
车祸后很久他才醒过来。
Chēhuò hòu hěnjiǔ tā cái xǐngguòlái。
After the car crash it took him a long time to come to.
出车祸的那天早晨，他就有一种不祥的预兆。

酒后驾车会酿成大祸。
Jiǔhòujiàchē huì niàngchéngdàhuò.

你开车要小心，千万别闯祸。

áizhěng
be in for criticism and denunciation
挨整。

yán\'ái shírì
play for time; stall (for time)
快走吧，别挨时间了。
Kuài zǒu ba，bié ái shíjiān le。

又堵车了，只能慢慢挨时间了。

The crowd is inevitable during the morning rush hour.

挨批评
áipīpíng 
be criticized
他老挨批，都皮了。
Tā lǎo áipī, dōu pí le。
He gets scolded so often that he no longer cares.
你非挨批不可。
Nǐ fēi áipī bùkě。
You are bound to be criticized.
再不听话，就得挨批评了。
Zàibùtīnghuà，jiùděi āipīpíng le。
If you don\'t do as you are told, you will get a telling off.
不该挨了批评就撂挑子。
Bùgāi ái le pīpíngjiù liàotiāozi。
It\'s bad to quit one\'s job just because one\'s been criticized.
他天天挨批评，已经皮了。
挨了批评心里闷堵得很。
我已然为你挨了批评，不能再为你办这件事了。

挨了一顿批评，他就发蔫了。
挨骂
áimà 
get a scolding; get a dressing-down
挨骂
áimà 
get told off

Tā yīnwèi méi wánchéng jiātíng zuòyè ér áimà.
He was told off for not doing his homework.
他挨了骂不算，还挨了一顿打。

píngbái ái yídùn mà

ái\'è 
suffer from hunger; go hungry

suffer from hunger

挨饿

to go hungry
挨饿

我可以给我家人挨个打电话。

He was called down to the principal\'s office to be reprimanded for his unexcused absences.
Tā yīn wúgù kuàngkè bèi jiàoqù xiàozhǎngshì āixùn。
他因无故旷课被叫去校长室挨训。
More than one billion people go hungry each year.
Měi nián dōu yǒu shíyì rén ái\'è。
每年都有10亿人挨饿。
We should not allow children to go hungry.
Wǒmen bù yīng ràng háizi ái\'è。
我们不应让孩子挨饿。
The policeman had me hard by the back of the neck.
Jǐngchá jǐn\'āizhe wǒ de bógěng。
警察紧挨着我的脖颈。
He swung the steamer hard by the barge.
Tā diàozhuǎn jǐn\'āizhe bóchuán de nà tiáo qìchuán。
他调转紧挨着驳船的那条汽船。
We don\'t want to come down too hard on her.
Wǒmen běnlái bù xiǎng hé tā āi de tài jǐn。
我们本来不想和她挨得太紧。
They hungered him into taking risks.
Tāmen ràng tā ái\'è，shǐ tā tǐng\'érzǒuxiǎn。
他们让他挨饿，使他铤而走险。
I want to plant out the rest of the garlic in pots near to the other onions.
Wǒ xiǎng bǎ qíyú de dàsuàn yǎng zài pén lǐ，āizhe yángcōng。
我想把其余的大蒜养在盆里，挨着洋葱。
I can ring round my family.
Wǒ kěyǐ gěi wǒ jiārén āigè dǎ diànhuà。
我可以给我家人挨个打电话。
It stands hard by the railroad tracks.
Tā jǐn\'āizhe tiědào。
它紧挨着铁道。
They starved the prisoners.
Tāmen ràng qiúfàn ái\'è。
他们让囚犯挨饿。
They were charged with the starvation of children in their care.
Tāmen yīnwèi háizǐmen zài tāmen de zhàoliào xià ái\'è ér shòudào zhǐkòng。
他们因为孩子们在他们的照料下挨饿而受到指控。
Old houses are often so densely packed that perhaps three or four have to be demolished for every new one built.
Lǎo fángzi chángcháng āi de hěn jǐn，suǒyǐ měi jiàn yí tào xīn fángzi kěnéng bùdébù chāidiào sān sì suǒ jiù fángzi。
老房子常常挨得很紧，所以每建一套新房子可能不得不拆掉三四所旧房子。
He knew he was in for a licking.
Tā zhīdào tā miǎnbùliǎo áidǎ。
他知道他免不了挨打。
He sat mutely next to her.
Tā āizhe tā jìngjìng de zuòzhe。
他挨着她静静地坐着。
Many famished in the countryside during the drought.
Gānhàn shíqī，xǔduō xiāngxiàrén ái\'è。
干旱时期，许多乡下人挨饿。
请您对这个剧本谈点看法吧，我们洗耳恭听。

Would you please give your comments on this play. We are waiting to hear them with respect.

洗耳恭听。
洗耳恭听。
I\'ll give you my full attention later but not now, I have to finish this article.

言词不恭
yáncí bù ɡōnɡ 
use disrespectful language
却之不恭，受之有愧。
Quèzhībùgōng，shòuzhīyǒukuì。
To decline would be disrespectful but to accept is embarrassing.
玩世不恭
wánshìbùgōng
thumb one\'s nose at the world; be cynical
既然你如此盛情相邀，我就却之不恭了。
Jìrán nǐ rúcǐ shèngqíng xiāngyāo，wǒ jiù quèzhībùgōng le。
It would be impolite for me to reject your kind invitation.
他是个玩世不恭的花花公子。
Tā shì gè wánshìbùgōng de huāhuāgōngzǐ。
He is a frivolous playboy.
他那几句英语，我实在不敢恭维。
Tā nà jǐ jù yīngyǔ，wǒ shízai bùgǎn gōngwei。
I can\'t compliment him on his English.
他虽然没什么出息，但也不愿卑恭屈节。
Tā suīrán méishénme chūxī，dàn yě búyuàn bēigōng qūjié。
Although he is not promising, he is unwilling to shrink back submissively.
只爱听恭维话，不爱听批评话
Zhǐ ài tīng gōngweihuà，bú ài tīng pīpínghuà。

他们仅仅触及树皮，他们不是砍树。

我从树上砍了一颗椰子，让它落到地上。
The trees were all cut down the next day by the landowner.
Zhèxiē shù dì-èr tiān bèi dìzhǔ kǎndào le。
这些树第二天被地主砍到了。
There\'s a stall selling chickens, all white and plucked with their heads cut off.

Wǒ nénggòu bǎ jià kǎn dào néng jiēshòu de shuǐpíng què yòu bǎochí tā de shíyòngxìng。
我能够把价砍到能接受的水平却又保持它的实用性。
In addition high usage of wood for fuel is a major cause of deforestation.
Lìngwài，dàliàng mùtou yòngzuò ránliào shì dǎozhì sēnlín kǎnfá de yí gè zhǔyào yuányīn。
另外，大量木头用作燃料是导致森林砍伐的一个主要原因。
Cutting off a person\'s hand is a harsh punishment for thievery.

把手砍掉是对偷窃者的严厉惩罚。

如今，我们国家每年砍掉大约二十万公顷的森林。

贝克汉姆是我心中最伟大的球员。
Bèikèhànmǔ shì wǒ xīnzhōng zuì wěidà de qiúyuán。
I think Beckham is the greatest football player.
贝克汉姆主罚的任意球命中率很高。

I want to hire a maid.

恢复原状
huīfù yuánzhuànɡ
restore the status quo ante; restore to the former state

恢恢
huīhuī
extensive; vast
犯罪分子最终被捉拿归案了，可谓“天网恢恢、疏而不漏”呀。
Fànzuì fènzǐ zuì zhōng bèi zhuōná guīàn le，kěwèi“tiānwǎnghuīhuī、shūérbúlòu”ya。
The criminal was finally caught. As the saying goes, justice has long arms.
建立 (断绝，恢复) 邦交
jiànlì (duànjué, huīfù) bāngjiāo
establish (sever, resume) diplomatic relations
有迹象表明会谈即将恢复。
Yǒu jì xiàng biǎomíng huìtán jíjiāng huīfù。
There are indications that the talks will be resumed soon.
恢复常态
huīfù chángtài 
return to normal (or normalcy)
恢复邦交
huīfù bānɡjiāo 
resume diplomatic relations
恢复正常
huīfù zhèngcháng
return to normal
恢复行使主权
huīfù xíngshǐ zhǔquán 
resume the exercise of sovereignty (over a place)
他的身体恢复了没有？
Tā de shēntǐ huīfù le méiyǒu? 
Is he fully recovered?
恢复镇静
huīfù zhènjìnɡ 
regain one\'s composure
恢复知觉
huīfù zhījúe
recover consciousness; come to
恢复民族权利
huīfù mínzú quánlì 
restoration of national rights
恢复名誉
huīfù mínɡyù 
rehabilitation (of a person\'s reputation)
恢复失地
huīfù shīdì 
restore lost land; recover lost territory
气度恢弘
qìdù huīhóng
broad-minded; magnanimous
北京许多古建筑已经修缮一新，恢复了旧观。
Běijīngxǔduō gǔjiànzhù yǐjing xiūshànyìxīn，huīfù le jiùguān。
Many old buildings in Beijing have been renovated and restored to their former glory (or splendour).
病人恢复得很慢。
Bìngrén huīfù de hěn màn。
The patient is making a slow recovery.
为两国之间恢复邦交铺平道路
wèi liǎngguó zhījiān huīfù bāngjiāo pūpíngdàolù
pave the way for the resumption of diplomatic relations between the two countries
线路正在抢修，半小时后恢复供电。
Xiànlù zhèngzài qiǎngxiū，bàn xiǎoshí hòu huī fù gòngdiàn。
The line is being rush-repaired and the power supply will return to normal in half an hour.
老厂恢复了青春。
Lǎo chǎng huīfù le qīngchūn。
The old factory has regained its old vigour.
适度的体育活动有利于病人恢复健康。
Shìdù de tǐyù huódòng yǒulì yú bìngrén huīfù jiànkāng。
A moderate amount of physical exercise will help improve the patient\'s health.
经过针刺恢复了听力
jīngguò zhēncì huīfù le tīnglì 
regain one\'s hearing after receiving acupuncture treatment
恢复外交关系
huīfù wàijiāo guānxì 
resume diplomatic relations
母已痊愈，惟体力尚未恢复。
Mǔ yǐ quányù，wéi tǐlì shàngwèi huīfù。
Mother\'s well now, but she hasn\'t fully recovered her strength yet.
尚未恢复健康
shànɡwèi huīfù jiànkānɡ 
not yet recovered (from illness); not yet restored to health
她脸上逐渐恢复了血色。
Tā liǎn shàngzhújiàn huīfù le xuèsè。
Little by little a healthy complexion came back to her face.
恢复正常业务
huīfù zhèngchángyèwù
resume normal business
恢复元气
huīfù yuánqì
regain one\'s strength (or health, vigour)
恢复原状
huīfù yuánzhuànɡ
restore the status quo ante; restore to the former state
祝你早日恢复健康。
Zhù nǐ zǎorì huīfù jiànkānɡ。
I hope you\'ll get well soon. or I wish you a speedy recovery.
经过这一段时间的训练，他的体力明显恢复了好多。
Jīngguò zhèyíduàn shíjiān de xùnliàn，tā de tǐlì míngxiǎn huīfùle hǎoduō。
所有的改线列车都将恢复原线运行。
Suǒyǒu de gǎixiàn lièchē dōu jiāng huīfù yuánxiàn yùnxíng。

Tā de gǔgéjī shòusǔn，bùzhīdào shénme shíhou huīfù。
It is hard to tell when the injury to his skeletal muscles can recover.
李明做了换心手术，现在身体恢复得很好。
Lǐ Míng zuò le huànxīn shǒushù，xiànzài shēntǐ huīfù de hěnhǎo。
Li Ming has had a heart transplantation operation. He is now he is recovering well.

We should carry Chinese traditional virtues forward.

Tā zǎoqī déguò jiǎkàng búguò xiànzài yǐjing huīfù le，tǐzhòng yě huíshēng le。
He once suffered from hyperthyroidism, but now he has recovered and  his weight has become normal again.
爷爷得了脑血栓，幸亏治疗及时，恢复得还算不错。

Tā bànyǎn de gǔdài huángdì qìdù huīhóng。

他术后恢复得很好，用不了几天就能出院了。
Tā shù hòu huīfù de hěnhǎo，yòngbùliǎo jǐtiān jiùnéng chūyuàn le。

Recovery was uneventful.
Huīfù guòchéng hěn píngwěn。
恢复过程很平稳。
Recovery was synchronous with therapy.
Huīfù yǔ zhìliáo shì tóngshí de。
恢复与治疗是同时的。
Her reinstatement to her former office followed quickly.
Tā hěn kuài huīfùle yuánlái de zhíwù。
她很快恢复了原来的职务。
She regained control of herself.
Tā huīfùle zhījué。
她恢复了知觉。
The company managed to recuperate.
Gāi gōngsī shìtú huīfù yuánqì。
该公司试图恢复元气。
He took time out to recuperate.
Tā tíngle yíhuìr yǐ huīfù tǐlì。
他停了一会儿以恢复体力。
It will not be business as usual for government bond prices.
zhèngfǔzhàiquàn de jiàgé jiāng búhuì huīfù chángtài。
政府债券的价格将不会恢复常态。
捉住不放
zhuōzhù bú fànɡ 
seize hold of sb. or sth. and not let go
to catch sb in the act (of doing sth)
当场捉住某人(做某事)
小强每年愚人节都想着法子捉弄别人。
Xiǎo Qiáng měinián yúrénjié dōu xiǎng zhe fǎzi zhuōnòng biérén。
Every April Fool\'s Day, Xiaoqiang would think of ways to trick others.
他们捉弄我，你该帮我解围。
Tāmen zhuōnòng wǒ，nǐ gāi bāng wǒ jiěwéi.
If they tease me you\'ll have to save my blushes.
捉弄
变法儿捉弄人
他总爱出鬼点子捉弄人。
play tricks
捉弄(某人)
to do a thing in play
捉弄中做一动作
The little boys were teasing a girl in the park.
Gōngyuán lǐ，xiǎonánhái men zài zhuōnòng yí gè xiǎonǚhái。
公园里，小男孩们在捉弄一个小女孩。
The children played a sly trick on their new teacher.
Háizǐmen wánpí de zhuōnòng tāmen de xīn lǎoshī。
孩子们顽皮地捉弄他们的新老师。
You had your fun at my expense!
Nǐ yǐ zhuōnòng wǒ wéi lè！
你以捉弄我为乐！
This predicament has us in an interesting position.
Jiǒngjìng zhuōnòng wǒmen， wǒ huáiyùn le。
窘境捉弄我们，我怀孕了。
What an impudent thing to make game of a king!
Zhuōnòng yí gè guówáng shì yíjiàn duōme fàngsì wúlǐ de shìqing!
捉弄一个国王是一件多么放肆无礼的事情！
The children tormented the stuttering teacher.
Zhè qún háizi zài zhuōnòng zhè wèi jiēbā de lǎoshī。
这群孩子在捉弄这位结巴的老师。
捉拿归案
zhuōná ɡuī\'àn 
arrest and bring a criminal to justice
犯罪分子最终被捉拿归案了，可谓“天网恢恢、疏而不漏”呀。
Fànzuì fènzǐ zuì zhōng bèi zhuōná guīàn le，kěwèi“tiānwǎnghuīhuī、shūérbúlòu”ya。
The criminal was finally caught. As the saying goes, justice has long arms.
犯罪分子就是跑到天涯海角，我们也要把他捉拿归案。
Fànzuì fènzǐ jiùshì pǎodào tiānyá hǎijiǎo，wǒmen yěyào bǎ tā zhuōná guīàn。
No matter how far the criminal goes, we\'ll catch him.
A fugitive drug trafficker was captured after two decades on the run .
Yì míng táowáng de dúfàn zài táowáng èrshí nián hòu bèi zhuōnáguī\'àn le。
一名逃亡的毒贩在逃亡二十年后被捉拿归案了。

zhuōná táofàn 
arrest an escaped prisoner
捉拿归案
zhuōná ɡuī\'àn 
arrest and bring a criminal to justice

Fànzuì fènzǐ jiùshì pǎodào tiānyá hǎijiǎo，wǒmen yěyào bǎ tā zhuōná guīàn。
No matter how far the criminal goes, we\'ll catch him.
政府悬赏百万美金捉拿要犯。
Zhèngfǔ xuánshǎng bǎiwàn měijīn zhuōná yàofàn。
The government offered a reward of a million dollars for the arrest of the perpetrator.
规划局的工作人员拿着楼盘的透视图反复捉摸其可行性。
Guīhuàjú de gōngzuòrényuán názhe lóupán de tòushìtú fǎnfù zhuōmō qí kěxíngxìng。
Working staff in the planning bureau are studying the practicality of these houses for sale from their perspective.
捉拿
千里寻踪，捉拿逃犯。
捉拿凶手。
重金悬赏捉拿逃犯。
捉拿犯罪嫌疑人。

捉拿这个越狱的犯人的悬赏是一万元。

这是一张悬赏捉拿一个逃跑奴隶的告示。
A fugitive drug trafficker was captured after two decades on the run .
Yì míng táowáng de dúfàn zài táowáng èrshí nián hòu bèi zhuōnáguī\'àn le。
一名逃亡的毒贩在逃亡二十年后被捉拿归案了。
The cattle thief has a price on his head.

这个偷牛贼被悬赏捉拿。
不可捉摸的概念
bùkězhuōmō de gàiniàn 
an elusive concept
不可捉摸的哲理文章
bùkězhuōmō de zhélǐ wénzhāng
intangible philosophical essays
情况不可捉摸。
Qíngkuàngbùkězhuōmō。
The situation is hard to size up.
他的态度反反复复，叫人难以捉摸。
Tā de tàidu fǎnfǎnfùfu，jiào rén nányǐzhuōmō。
He\'s always chopping and changing, and you just can\'t tell where he stands.
难以捉摸
nányǐ zhuōmó
difficult to pin down; elusive; unintelligible
他从老张的笑意里捉摸出了深味。
Tā cóng Lǎo Zhāng de xiàoyì lǐ zhuōmō chū le shēnwèi。
He sees profound meaning behind Lao Zhang\'s smile.
捉摸不定
zhuōmō bú dìnɡ
difficult to ascertain; unpredictable; elusive
他变化无常，让人捉摸不透。
Tā biànhuà wúcháng，ràng rén zhuōmō bútòu。
He keeps chopping and changing, which puzzles everyone.

天机不可捉摸。
捉摸不透。
to keep sb guessing
让某人捉摸不定
His subtle satisfaction seemed to permeate the space around them.
Tā nányǐzhuōmō de mǎnzúgǎn hǎoxiàng mímàn zài le tāmen de zhōuwéi。
他难以捉摸的满足感好像弥漫在了他们的周围。
But there is still a twilight zone, the tantalizing occurrences that are probably noise but might possibly be a signal.
Dàn yīrán cúnzài yígè guòdù qūyù，huì chūxiàn yěxǔ shì zàoshēng dàn yě kěnéng shì xìnhào de lìng rén zhuōmōbúdìng de qíngkuàng。
但依然存在一个过渡区域，会出现也许是噪声但也可能是信号的令人捉摸不定的情况。
Figures light and aeriform come unlooked for and melt away.
Lái wú zōng qù wú yǐng，qīngyíng ér nányǐ zhuōmō de shēnyǐng。
来无踪去无影，轻盈而难以捉摸的身影。
A certain fluidness in his perception of time made him an unpredictable colleague.
Tā duì shíjiāngàiniàn de búquèdìngxìng shǐ tā chéngwéi yíwèi nányǐzhuōmō de tóngshì。
他对时间概念的不确定性使他成为一位难以捉摸的同事。
你就直说吧，不要跟我捉迷藏了。
Nǐ jiù zhí shuō ba，búyào gēn wǒ zhuōmícáng le。
Get straight to the point. Don\'t beat about the bush.
捉迷藏，两个大人抵不上一个娃娃
别捉迷藏了，有话直说吧。
This detector can acquire multiple signals.
这个探测器能捕捉多种信号。

这消息从哪来的？你不要总是望风捉影！

Where did you get the news? Don\'t speak based on hearsay.
青蛙能捕捉大量害虫，是一种益兽。
Qīngwā néng bǔzhuō dàliàng hàichóng，shì yìzhǒng yìshòu。
Frogs are able to capture a great deal of insects, they are a kind of beneficial animal.
银环蛇有巨毒，大家看到了可千万不要随便捉。
Yínhuánshé yǒu jùdú，dàjiā kàndào le kě qiānwàn búyào suíbiàn zhuō。
Silver-ringed snakes are venomous, don\'t try to capture them when you see them.
这篇自叙是老科学家生前自己捉刀写成的。

Without moving the camera, I shot the picture four times.
Wǒ yìlián sì cì bǔzhuōdàole zhège huàmiàn ér méiyǒu yídòng shèxiàngjī。
我一连四次捕捉到了这个画面而没有移动摄像机。
A cat stalks a duck until it gets within striking distance.
Yì zhī māo gēnzōngzhe yì zhī yāzi，zhídào kàojìn dào tā néng zhuō dào yāzi de jùlí。
一只猫跟踪着一只鸭子，直到靠近到它能捉到鸭子的距离。
Some native people throw walnut leaves into rivers to poison the fish; dead fish are easy to catch.
Yìxiē tǔzhùrén jiāng hétao shùyè diū jìn hé lǐ jiāng yú dú sǐ；ér sǐ yú shì hěn róngyì zhuō de。
一些土著人将核桃树叶丢进河里将鱼毒死；而死鱼是很容易捉的。
The children played a sly trick on their new teacher.

你以捉弄我为乐！
Exhausted by the journey, the birds were easy to catch.

当因为长途飞行而筋疲力尽时，鸟儿很容易被捕捉。

没有许可，人们不允许在湖区捉鱼。
This predicament has us in an interesting position.

Journalists are out in force，trying to capture this moment.

大批记者涌了出去，希望捕捉到这个瞬间。

Zhuōnòng yí gè guówáng shì yíjiàn duōme fàngsì wúlǐ de shìqing!
捉弄一个国王是一件多么放肆无礼的事情！
I strain my ears to catch some pretty rocking bird beats.

The moment the announcement of Mei Lanfang\'s performance was written on the billboard outside the theater, tickets sold out in a rush.
梅兰芳先生可称京剧界的泰山北斗。
Méi Lánfāng xiānshēng kě chēng jīngjùjiè de tàishān běidǒu。
Mr. Mei Lanfang can be called the foremost actor of Beijing Opera.
今天的戏一定精彩，因为是梅兰芳先生挂头牌。
Jīntiān de xì yídìng jīngcǎi，yīnwèi shì Méi Lánfāng xiānshēng guà tóupái。
Today\'s opera will definitely be wonderful, because Mr. Mei Lanfang is the leading actor.
梅兰芳不幸永逝，真是中国京剧的一大损失。
Méi Lánfāng búxìng yǒngshì，zhēnshì Zhōngguó jīngjù de yídà sǔnshī。
The death of Meilanfang is a huge loss for China\'s Beijing Opera.
现在回想起梅兰芳的京剧，依然觉得余音绕梁。
Xiànzài huíxiǎng qǐ Méi Lánfāng de jīngjù，yīrán juédé yúyīn ràoliáng。
Even now, when recalling the Beijing Opera performed by Mei Lanfang, I can still hear the music lingering around the beams.
梅兰芳是我国著名京剧表演艺术家。
Méi Lánfāng shì wǒguó zhùmíng jīngjù biǎoyǎn yìshùjiā。
Mei Lanfang is a famous performing artist of Beijing opera.
得梅兰芳先生的真传。
Mei Lanfang is acknowledged to be a master of Beijing opera.
梅兰芳是公认的京剧大师。
流芳百世
liúfāngbǎishì
leave a good name for a hundred generations; leave a good name to posterity; win immortal fame; leave one\'s mark on history
他是人们心目中流芳千古的民族英雄。
Tā shì rénmen xīnmù zhōng liúfāng qiāngǔ de mínzú yīngxióng。
He is a national hero with immortal fame in people’s minds.
岳飞虽然被秦桧害死了，但他的美名万古流芳！
Yuè Fēi suīrán bèi Qín Huì hài sǐ le，dàn tā de měimíng wàngǔ liúfāng！
Although Yue Fei was put to death by Qin Hui, his good name will last forever!
周信芳在京剧流派中是属于海派而不是京派。
Zhōu Xìnfāng zài jīngjù liúpài zhōng shì shǔyú hǎipài ér búshì jīngpài。
Zhou Xinfang performs in the Shanghai opera style rather than the Beijing opera style.
千古流芳
流芳百世
流芳百世
流芳千古。
万古流芳。
an immortal poet
流芳百世的诗人
Shakespeare is one of the immortals.
Shāshìbǐyà shì yí wèi liúfāngbǎishì de rén。
莎士比亚是一位流芳百世的人。
孤芳自赏
弟弟已经五天没有消息了，小芳忧心如焚。
Dìdi yǐjing wǔ tiān méiyǒu xiāoxi le，Xiǎo Fāng yōuxīn rúfén。
Having heard nothing from her brother for five days, Xiaofang is burning with anxiety.
他是人们心目中流芳千古的民族英雄。
Tā shì rénmen xīnmù zhōng liúfāng qiāngǔ de mínzú yīngxióng。
He is a national hero with immortal fame in people’s minds.
她的芳泽打动了我的心！
Tā de fāngzé dǎdòng le wǒ de xīn！
I am attracted by her good looks.
芳心已动
阵阵芳罄沁人心脾。
满园芳菲沁人心脾
The two men competed for her attention.
这两个男人都想博得她的芳心。
His eyes caught many girls\' hearts.
Tā de yǎnjing bǔhuòle hěn duō nǚhái de fāngxīn。
他的眼睛捕获了很多女孩的芳心。
He had a cat\'s chance in hell of winning her heart.
Tā duì yíngdé tā de fāngxīn bú bào rènhé xīwàng。
他对赢得她的芳心不抱任何希望。
He teaches how to succeed with women.
Tā jiàoshòu rúhé chénggōng yíngdé nǚrén fāngxīn。
他教授如何成功赢得女人芳心。
Faint heart ne\'er won fair lady.
Ruǎnruò de xīn cónglái bù néng yíngdé yǎotiǎoshūnǚ de fāngxīn。
软弱的心从来不能赢得窈窕淑女的芳心。
春天的原野散发着泥土的芳香。
Chūntiān de yuányě sànfā zhe nítǔ de fāngxiāng。
In spring the fields give off the aroma of the earth.
我喜欢上了青茶的芳香。
Wǒ xǐhuan shàng le qīngchá de fāngxiāng。
I fell in love with the aroma of oolong tea.
芳香的花朵
fāngxiāngde huāduǒ
fragrant flower
芳香
芳香。
芳香族化合物。
芳香四溢
芳香馥郁
郁郁芳香。
Thus has been valued for it embalming  properties in the past.
Zài guòqù，fāngxiāngshùzhī yīnwèi fāngxiāng mírén de tèxìng ér yìcháng ángguì。
在过去，芳香树脂因为芳香迷人的特性而异常昂贵。
This is a rich wine with a persistent aroma.
此酒芳香醇厚绵长。
The meadows still smells of windrow.
草场还弥漫着干草的芳香。
The food has a hint of spice, too, just to confuse you.
Zhèzhǒng shíwù yǒu yì zhǒng qīngwēi de fāngxiāng，nà yě jǐnjǐn shì yònglái míhuò nǐ de。
这种食物有一种轻微的芳香，那也仅仅是用来迷惑你的。
In the spring the garden was a riot of colour and scent.
Chūntiān，huāyuánlǐ chàzǐyānhóng，fāngxiāng sì yì。
春天，花园里姹紫嫣红，芳香四溢。
Many of the older rose varieties also have a strong scent.
Xǔduō guòqù de méiguī pǐnzhǒng tóngyàng jùyǒu nóngliè de fāngxiāng。
许多过去的玫瑰品种同样具有浓烈的芳香。
Tea has fragrant white flowers.
Cháshù kāi fāngxiāng de báihuā。
茶树开芳香的白花。
The pine woods were more redolent.
Sōngmù gèng jùyǒu fāngxiāng wèi。
松木更具有芳香味。
The hall was redolent of floor wax.
Zhège dàtīng yǒu dìbǎn là de fāngxiāng wèi。
这个大厅有地板蜡的芳香味。
虽然听过名字，他至今没见过她的芳容。
Suīrán tīng guò míngzi，tā zhìjīn méi jiàn guò tā de fāngróng。
Though knowing her name, he has not had the chance to see her yet.
手风琴伴奏：张小芳
shǒufēngqín bànzòu: Zhāng Xiǎofāng

Kōngqì lǐ mímàn zhe méigui de fēnfāng。
The sweet smell of roses fills the air.

Chūntiān de yuányě sànfā zhe nítǔ de fāngxiāng。
In spring the fields give off the aroma of the earth.
他有幸为梅兰芳配过戏。
Tā yǒuxìngwèi Méilánfāngpèiguò xì。
He had the hon-our of playing a supporting role in an opera starring Mei Lanfang.
一阵芬芳的气息从花丛中吹过来。
Yízhèn fēnfāng de qìxī cónghuācóng zhōng chuī guòlai。
A waft of sweet-smelling fragrance blew over from the flower bush.

flowers vying with each other in beauty

fāngfēi
the fragrance of flowers and plants
梅兰芳先生的唱功无与伦比。
Méi Lánfāng xiānshēng de chànggōng wúyǔlúnbǐ。
Mr Mei Lanfang\'s singing skill is matchless in the world.
梅兰芳大师技艺高超，艺德高尚，足以垂范戏曲后辈。
Méi Lánfāng dàshī jìyì gāochāo，yìdé gāoshàng，zúyǐ chuífàn xìqǔ hòubèi。
With superb skills and respectable artistic morals, the master, Meilanfang, sets a good example for his inferiors in the field of opera.
包拯刚正不阿，垂芳千载。
Bāo Zhěng gāngzhèngbù\'ē，chuífāng qiānzǎi。
Baozheng was upright and outspoken, which has gained everlasting fame for him in history.
“随意春芳歇，王孙自可留”。
“Suíyìchūnfāngxiē，wángsūnzìkěliú”。
Noble young men will be detained by spring flowers.
她演的这出戏是梅兰芳单传的。
Tā yǎn de zhèchū xì shì Méi Lánfāng dānchuán de。
The play she performed is passed only by Mei Lanfang.
那些春花芳草，全都生意盎然。
Nàxiē chūnhuā fāngcǎo，quándōu shēngyì àngrán。
Those spring  flowers and fragrant grass are full of life.
《离骚》：“何所独无芳草兮，又何怀乎故宇”。
《Lísāo》：“Hésuǒ dúwú fāngcǎoxī，yòuhé huáihūgùyǔ”。
According to The Lament by Qu Yuan, one can feel at home wherever one goes as long as one can take things as they come.
家有芳邻，彼此也好有个照应。
Jiā yǒu fānglín，bǐcǐ yě hǎo yǒu gè zhàoyìng。
Good neighbors can achieve mutual care.
她青春年少，正当芳年。
Tā qīngchūn niánshào，zhèngdāng fāngnián。
She is young and is at the golden age of her life.
虽然听过名字，他至今没见过她的芳容。
Suīrán tīng guò míngzi，tā zhìjīn méi jiàn guò tā de fāngróng。
Though knowing her name, he has not had the chance to see her yet.
她很喜欢花草茶的那份芳馨。
Tā hěn xǐhuan huācǎochá de nà fèn fāngxīn。
She likes the fragrance of flower tea.
古代女子们使用的芳泽应该就是现在的护发素。
Gǔdài nǚzǐmen shǐyòng de fāngzé yīnggāi jiùshì xiànzài de hùfàsù。
The scented hair oil used by ancient women is like conditioner today.
她的芳泽打动了我的心！
Tā de fāngzé dǎdòng le wǒ de xīn！
I am attracted by her good looks.
他常梦到她的芳姿，觉得自己可能爱上她了。
Tā cháng mèng dào tā de fāngzī，jué de zìjǐ kěnéng ài shàng tā le。
He often dreams about her and feels that he might have fallen in love with her.
我躬逢梅兰芳艺术高峰的时代，他真不愧为京剧大师。
Wǒ gōngféng Méi Lánfāng yìshù gāofēng de shídài，tā zhēn búkuì wéi jīngjù dàshī。
I was present in person at the height of Meilanfang\'s art career. He really deserves to be called a master of Beijing Opera.
周信芳是海派京剧的代表人物之一。
Zhōu Xìnfāng shì hǎipài jīngjù de dàibiǎo rénwù zhīyī。
Zhou Xinfang is a representative of the Shanghai school of Beijing opera.
他极意想知道小芳喜欢什么东西，好在情人节送给她。
Tā jíyì xiǎng zhīdào Xiǎo Fāng xǐhuan shénme dōngxi，hǎozài qíngrénjié sònggěi tā。
He tried every means to know what Xiao Fang liked so as to give it to her on Valentine\'s Day.
周信芳在京剧流派中是属于海派而不是京派。
Zhōu Xìnfāng zài jīngjù liúpài zhōng shì shǔyú hǎipài ér búshì jīngpài。
Zhou Xinfang performs in the Shanghai opera style rather than the Beijing opera style.
周信芳先生在上海时排了许多连台本戏，比如《西游记》。
Zhōu Xìnfāng xiānshēng zài Shànghǎi shí pái le xǔduō liántái běnxì，bǐrú《Xīyóujì》。
When Zhou Xinfang was in Shanghai, he had performed many dramas in chapter such as Journey to the West.
他是人们心目中流芳千古的民族英雄。
Tā shì rénmen xīnmù zhōng liúfāng qiāngǔ de mínzú yīngxióng。
He is a national hero with immortal fame in people’s minds.
梅兰芳是京剧四大名旦之一。

Mei Lanfang is one of the four famous dans in Beijing opera.

Mei yanfang, one of the four most famous singers will come and sing a song for us tonight.
小芳总是管乡下二叔的儿子叫“乡下佬”。
Xiǎo Fāng zǒngshì guǎn xiāngxià èrshū de érzi jiào xiāngxiàlǎo。
Xiao Fang always call her uncle\'s son &quot;a country boy&quot;.
刘兰芳把醒木一敲，开始说书了。
Liú Lánfāng bǎ xǐngmù yìqiāo，kāishǐ shuōshū le。
Liu Lanfang gave one beat of the gavel and began his storytelling.
梅兰芳不幸永逝，真是中国京剧的一大损失。
Méi Lánfāng búxìng yǒngshì，zhēnshì Zhōngguó jīngjù de yídà sǔnshī。

我可是久仰尊夫人的芳名，今天才有幸见到。
Wǒ kěshì jiǔyǎng zūnfūrén de fāngmíng，jīntiān cái yǒuxìng jiàndào。

我邻居认为所有人和事都不值一顾。
That neighbor has a finger in every pie in everyone\'s business.
Nàgè línjū ài guǎn měi gè rén de xiánshì。
那个邻居爱管每个人的闲事。
My neighbor is a vinegary person. I don\'t like her.
我的邻居是个刻薄的人，我不喜欢她。
The neighbors accused the man of spousal abuse.
Línjūmen zhǐkòng zhège rén nuèdài qīzǐ。
邻居们指控这个人虐待妻子。
Sociably, the new neighbors invited everyone on the block for coffee.
Nàgè xǐhào jiāojì de xīn línjū yāoqǐng jiēqū de měi gè rén qù hē kāfēi。
那个喜好交际的新邻居邀请街区的每个人去喝咖啡。
The neighbour was one that kept early hours.
Wǒ de línjū shì yí gè zǎoshuìzǎoqǐ de rén。
我的邻居是一个早睡早起的人。

皇帝不理人民对战争的憎恶，坚持对邻国发动战争。
The vicinity is rich in places of historic and architectural interest.
Línjìn dìqū yǒu xǔduō yǒuqù de lìshǐ hé jiànzhù qūyù。
邻近地区有许多有趣的历史和建筑区域。
The sewage plant served the neighboring communities.
Zhè zuò wūshuǐ chǔlǐchǎng chǔlǐ línjìn zhèxiē shèqū de wūshuǐ。
这座污水处理厂处理邻近这些社区的污水。

Zài liǎnggè pílín de xiànchéng zhōng，68 gè shèqū zhōng yǒu 16 gè zài bèi suíyì xuǎnle chūlái。
在两个毗邻的县城中，68个社区中有16个在被随意选了出来。
Territory disputes can set off violence between neighbors.
Dìqū zhēngduān huì yǐnqǐ xiānglínguójiā de bàolìchōngtū。
地区争端会引起相邻国家的暴力冲突。

定期的社区聚会可以营造良好的邻里关系。

Tā yíguàn qīyā línlǐ，jīyuàn shèn duō。

gébì línjū
next-door neighbour

bǎ háizi jìtuō zài línjū jiālǐ

我们的邻居想把五只小猫都给我们，我们只留了一只。

Our neighbours wanted to give us all of their five kittens, but we only took one.

jìnlín
near neighbour

邻近

邻近
in the neighbourhood of sth
[+place] 邻近某处

He always rode roughshod over his neighbours and incurred widespread resentment.

bǎ háizi jìtuō zài línjū jiālǐ

yòngwǔlì jiānbìnglínguó lǐngtǔ

他向邻居借了扁铲。
Tā xiàng línjū jiè le biǎnchǎn。
He borrowed a flat chisel from his neighbor.

孩子抵死不承认是他打碎了邻居家的玻璃。

When he has nothing to do, he goes to the courtyard and chats idly with the neighbors.

我弟弟学着狗叫的样子对着邻居的猫汪汪地叫。
A second medieval wall butts the earlier wall.
Dì-èr tiáo zhōngshìjì de qiángbì jǐnlínzhe zǎo xiān de nàduàn qiáng。
第二条中世纪的墙壁紧邻着早先的那段墙。
The north tower butts against the outer wall.
Běibiān nà zuò tǎ jǐnlínzhe wài wéiqiáng。
北边那座塔紧邻着外围墙。
One of her neighbors always collared the boy and brought him back home.
Tā de yí gè línjū jīngcháng zhuāzhe zhège nánhái de lǐngzi bǎ tā tí huíjiā。
她的一个邻居经常抓着这个男孩的领子把他提回家。
The neighbours complained and they had to cut the music.
Zuǒlínyòushè yǒusuǒ bàoyuàn，tāmen bùdébù tíngxiàle yīnyuè。
左邻右舍有所抱怨，他们不得不停下了音乐。
More neighbours arrived, aroused by the frantic screaming.
Gèngduō de línjū láile，yǐnqǐle huāngluàn de yí zhèn jiānjiào。
更多的邻居来了，引起了慌乱的一阵尖叫。
The vicinity is rich in places of historic and architectural interest.

邻近地区有许多有趣的历史和建筑区域。
Phased evacuation means evacuating the floor where the fire is located first, and then the floor immediately above it.

分阶段撤离意味着先着火的地点先撤离，紧邻火场上方的部位随后撤离。
The sun is the primary body in our neighborhood.
Tàiyáng shì wǒmen de yǔzhòu línjū zhōng de zhǔyào tiāntǐ。
太阳是我们的宇宙邻居中的主要天体。
My brother loves to flash his jewelry to the girls around the neighborhood.
Wǒ xiōngdi xǐhuan xiàng línjū de nǚhái xuànyào tā de zhūbǎo。
我兄弟喜欢向邻居的女孩炫耀他的珠宝。
I was in danger of being fooled by the neighborhood kids.

我差点被邻居的小孩给骗了。
As chance would have it, I met my neighbor when camping with my friends.

我邻居认为所有人和事都不值一顾。
The man chucked bricks at the neighbor\'s window.

这个人朝他邻居的窗户扔着砖块。
My ill mannered neighbor is just as common as an old shoe.

我举止粗鲁的邻居事实上很容易相处。
Dead wood should be cut out, allowing adjacent healthy growth to fill the gap.

She isn\'t familiar with her neighbors.

她对邻居不是很友好。

总的来说，他们和新邻居相处得不错。
That neighbor has a finger in every pie in everyone\'s business.

那个邻居爱管每个人的闲事。

我的邻居是一个早睡早起的人。

关键的证人(或证据)

键子不灵的钢琴

关键是得知道他大概什么时候到。

关键词
